4a1('bum): shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / ting nge rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
4a2('bum): bcus yongs su ma bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen
4a3('bum): bos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam kigi rnam pashes pa nyid
4a4('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam ka rnam pa shes pa nyadakyus yangs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung na// rab 'byor
4a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni b.ramador nye zhor 'gyur te// 'di ltar thams cadamakhyend pa nyid rin po che'i don chen po dang bral zhing
4a6('bum): rin po che chen po las 'phang bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bar ma dor nye zho gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyis
4a7('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes kyi mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i gre shi nad tu bsdams shing shi nad tu bstar ba/ tshul
4a8('bum): gtong zhing rdzas 'jug na n+ya/ rab 'byor nga rgya mtsho'i chu de ni bar ma dor zhig par gyi 'gyur te/ chu des phyogs gang du bgrod pa der phyi nad par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor da de bzhin
4b1('bum): tu byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po gang bla ma mye za yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yod/ mos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod// 
4b2('bum): dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ myi gtong ba yang yod/ brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba yod la/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su
4b3('bum): bzung / bsam gtan ki pha rol tu phyi nang pas yongs su bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung / bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyi nang pas yongs su bzung / 
4b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su rngub tu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung // phyi stong pa nyid kyis
4b5('bum): yongs su bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chen po / stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyi
4b6('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / sum byas cwo za hU~M skyes su bcu / yum pa byas stong pa nyid kyis po su 'azung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su lo gzung / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
4b7('bum): bzung / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang gi mtshan
4b8('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
8a1('bum): pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs
8a2('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
8a3('bum): nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung na// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
8a4('bum): de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma
8a5('bum): bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sa yongs su ma bzung ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyi nad pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / tshul khrims
8a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung ba dang // nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa'i
8a7('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma
8a8('bum): bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang
8b1('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang
8b2('bum): rab bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang/ myil
8b3('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dngos po myed pa'i
8b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dngas pa myed pa'ing ba nyid yong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yong su
8b5('bum): ma bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yo su ma bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / dbang po rnams kyis yongasasu
8b6('bum): ma bzung ba dang / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung po dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan laka brkyang pas yongs su
8b7('bum): bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang la na kyi dag pa byed pa rnams kyis yongs sum bzung ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis
8b8('bum): 'ongs su ma bzung ba dang / rnam par bar pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / mapa nga kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma 'azung ba dang / rnam par sa ra
9a1('bum): go stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pas yongs sum bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis yongs su ma 'dung/ 
9a2('bum): ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung ba dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par
9a3('bum): rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung ba dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyis yongs su
9a4('bum): ma bzung ba dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung ba dang / lam ki rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yod su ma bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
9a5('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byord 'di lta ste/ dper na myi na chod kyis lo brgya nyi shu lonapa/ rgas pa rgog tu gyur pa/ 'khogos pa de nyid kyi
9a6('bum): lus la rlung ngam/ 'khrigs pa'am/ bad kan nam/ 'dus pa'i nad kyis btab par gyurd nA/ de khri las ldang bar 'dod na/ de la skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis klo g.yas
9a7('bum): g.yon nas bzung ste/ brtan nas 'di skad tu ke ma skyes bu khyod dga' ba'i don tu gar 'dod par dong ngo // khyod ni bdag cag gis bzung gis gnas der ma phyi nad kyi bar du lam du bamam
9a8('bum): ngor rdeg 'cha' bas 'jigs par myi 'gyur ro zhes bsgog pa de bzhin tu/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
9b1('bum): kyi phyir dad pa yang yod/ bzod pa yang yodamos pa yang yod/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang yod/ dga' ba yang yod/ spro ba yang yod/ myi gtong ba yang yod/ bapon 'grus myi 'dor ba
9b2('bum): yang yod la de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su bzung / bcon 'grus kyi pha rol
9b3('bum): tu phyi nad pas yongs su bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol da tu phyind pas yongs su bzung / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung // 
9b4('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / chen po stong panyi
9b5('bum): kyis yongs su bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bcu// pa/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / mtha'
9b6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / bog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dor ba myed pa ni/ ngapa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis
9b7('bum): yongs su bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / byi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po myed pa
9b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su
10a1('bum): yongs su bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung / rdzu 'phrul ki rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung / stobs rnams kyis yos/ 
10a2('bum): bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / bsam gtan
10a3('bum): rnams kyis yongs su bzung / tshad myed pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / rnam par thar dpa' brgyad kyis yongs su
10a4('bum): bzung / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nga gus yongs su bzung / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nye/ nga dang mtshan ma myed pa dang spond pa myed pas yongs su bzung
10a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung / tangi nge 'dzi nad rnams kyis yongs su bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
10a6('bum): stobs bcus yongs su bzung / myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung / snying rje chen pos
10a7('bum): yongs su bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung / lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bcu
10a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung na// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bar ma dor nye zhor myi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems / 
10b1('bum): dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gnas der phyi nad par nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang / thabs mkha
10b2('bum): pa dang / ma bral ba'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral bas nyan
10b3('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkalasaHlad pa/ rab 'byor dang khyod de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi don tu de
10b4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so/ legs so// rab 'byor nga 'di la gang zag byang chub ste/ mas dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar sbyin pa yongs su gtong na
10b5('bum): de bdag dang bdag gang ltung ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa'i yongs su gtong zhing tshul khrims srung ba dang / brjo/ da pa bsgom pa dang / brtson 'grus chom pa dang / bas
10b6('bum): gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / shes rab sgom pa de'ang bdag dang bdag gir ltung ba'i sems kyis shes rab bsgom ste/ de sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di snyam du sems
10b7('bum): te/ bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / 'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // bdag ni sbyin par byed pa'o// bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di srung po/ bdag ni tshul
10b8('bum): khrims dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo/ bzod pa ni'adi sgom mo/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni batshon 'grus chom mo/ brtson 'grus ni 'di chom mo/ bdag
11a1('bum): ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o// bdag ni bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go/ bdag ni bsam gtan pa'o// bdag
11a2('bum): ni shes rab skom mo/ shes rab ni 'di skom mo// bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o snyam nas/ de sbyin pa rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o/ 
11a3('bum): zhes rlom sems su byed/ de tshul khrims rlom sems su byed/ tshul khrims kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bzod pa rlom
11a4('bum): sems su byed/ bzod pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed de bcon 'grus rlom sems su byed/ ba rtson 'grus
11a5('bum): kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni 'tshon 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de 'asam gtan te rnams rlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan rnams kyis
11a6('bum): rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan bya'o zhes rlom sems su byed de shes rab kyis rlom sems su byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni shes rab
11a7('bum): dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa de dag myed de ring du song ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa'o// tshul khris
11a8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa de dag myed de/ ring tu song ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la rtog pa de dag byed de/ ring tu song ba ni/ 
11b1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la rtog pa myed de/ ri tu song ba ni batshon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind
11b2('bum): pa la rtog pa myed de/ ring du song ba ni bsam gtan gi pha rol da tu phyi nad pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la rtog pa de dag myed de/ ring tu song ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
11b3('bum): pa'o// de lta yin yang ga pa zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ring tu song ba 'ang myi shes/ pha rol kyang myi shes te/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung
11b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pas yongs su ma
11b5('bum): bzung / bsam ka tan gi pha rol tu phyi nad pas yo su ma bzung / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung // nang stong pa nyid kyis smosu
11b6('bum): ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyin pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid
11b7('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma 'bru
11b8('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung
12a1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / myi
12a2('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
12a3('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis
12a4('bum): yongs su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'phags
12a5('bum): ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / tshad myed
12a6('bum): pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par tha rang po brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar kyis gnas pa'i
12a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su ma bzung / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo sta ngo pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongasasu
12a8('bum): ma bzung / ting nge 'dzind rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung / myi 'jigs pa
12b1('bum): bzhis yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / snying rje chen pos yongs su ma bzung / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
12b2('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam ki rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis
12b3('bum): yongs su ma bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du myi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor nga ji ltar na gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
12b4('bum): pa pa thabs myi mkhas pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar thabs myed par sbyin pa yongs su gtong / thabs myed par tshul
12b5('bum): khrims srung thabs myed par bzod pa sgom/ thabs byed bar brtson 'grus thom/ thabs myed par bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug/ thabs myed par shes rab sgom zhing
12b6('bum): de 'di snyam tu sems te/ bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / sbyin pa ni yongs su gtong ngo po// bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo // bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo// bzod
12b7('bum): pa ni 'di skam po/ bdag ni brtson 'grus chom so// brtson 'grus ni 'di ma ma tshag gto// bdag ni gis rab sbom so// shes 'badi 'di na
12b8('bum): so zhes de sbyin pa rlom sems su byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes chos sems su byed/ de tshul khrims rlom sems su byed/ tshul khrims kyis rlom ma
13a1('bum): su byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o// the tsho sems su byed/ de bzod pa rlom sems su myi byed/ bzod pas rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes
13a2('bum): rlom sems su byed/ de brtson 'grus rlom sems su byed/ brtson 'grus kyis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de bsam gtan
13a3('bum): rlom sems su byed/ bsam gtan kis rlom sems su byed/ bdag ni bsam brtan dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed/ de shes rab rlom sems su byed/ shes rab kyis rlom
13a4('bum): sems su byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su byed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag sbyin pa'i pha rol
13a5('bum): tu phyi nad pa la myed pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhi de ni de nga didani byin ni ma yo tu phyin pa de ni la tu phyin bye pa ca den 'aton min pa rtog pa de dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu/ phyind pa la byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta
13a6('bum): rgyal khrims kyi pha rolas tu phyin pa de ni pha rolang tu phyi nang bskyed pa'o// 'i \u0f7fma na re nas par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa sa myed do// de'i'i phyir nan/ 
13a7('bum): de ni 'dri ltar 'di lta skye/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de ni pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'o// ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag 'artson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la byed/ 
13a8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa de ni pha rol tu phyind pa' myed pa'o// ji ltar de rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag bsam gtan
13b1('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa de ni bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa myed po la/ ji ltar de rnam par rtog
13b2('bum): pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de ni pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'o// 
13b3('bum): de ltar yin yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni ring tu song ba yang myi shes pha rol kyang myi shes te/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
13b4('bum): phyi nad pas yongs su ma bzung / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su ma bzung / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol da tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan ki pha
13b5('bum): rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su ma bzung/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung // nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi stong pa nyid
13b6('bum): kyis yongs su ma bzung / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / don dam pa stong
13b7('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis
13b8('bum): yongs su ma bzung / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
14a1('bum): ma bzung / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bajug
14a2('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung // dran pa nye bar
14a3('bum): gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su
14a4('bum): ma bzung/ stobs rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su ma
14a5('bum): bzung / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / bsam gtan rnams kyis yongs su ma pa zung tshad myed pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung
14a6('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus
14a7('bum): yongs su ma bzung / rnam par tha rad ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pas yongs su ma bzung / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / 
14a8('bum): ting nge 'dzind nams kyis yongs su ma bzung / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su ma bzung / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su ma bzung / myi 'jigs pa 'a
14b1('bum): yongs su ma bzung / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su ma bzung / byams pa chen pos yongs su ma bzung / nying rje chen pos kyis yongs su ma bzung / sangs
14b2('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su ma bzung / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / lam ki rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung / rnam pa thams
14b3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su ma bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du myi 'byung ngo // rab 'byor du ji ltar
14b4('bum): kang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang thabs mkhas pas yongs su bcudab/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi
14b5('bum): lhung ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par 'gyur ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog par sbyin
14b6('bum): ba yongs su gtong na/ bdag dang bdag kir bya bar ma ltung ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis nul
14b7('bum): khrims srung ngo // bzod pa bsgom na 'dag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis bzod pa sgrom mo// brtson 'grus khom na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis
14b8('bum): brtson 'grus pacom mo/ bsam gtan bsgom na bdag dang bdag kaur bya bar ma lhung ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan skom mo/ shes rab skom na bdag dang bdag gir bya bar ma lhung DI
15a1('bum): sems kyis shes rab sgo de / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // 'di la sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo zhes bya bar myi sems so// bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo// bdaka na tshul khrims
15a2('bum): tshul khrims ni 'di srung ngo zhes bya bar myi sems so// bdag ni bzod pa bsgom mo// bzod pa ni 'di bsgom mo zhes bya bar myi sems so// bdag ni batshon 'grus chom mo// brtson 'grus
15a3('bum): niblo chom mo zhes bya bar myi sems so// bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan ni 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug go zhes bya bar myi sems so// bdag ni shes
15a4('bum): rab sgom mo/ shes rab ni 'di bsgom mo zhes bya bar myi sems so// de sbyin pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed
15a5('bum): pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do// tshul khrims n+do/ ma sems su myi byed/ tshul khrims kyis rlom sems// su myi byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes
15a6('bum): brlom sems su myi byed do// bzod pa rlom sems su myi byed/ bzod pas rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su myi byed
15a7('bum): do// brtson 'grus rlom sems su myi byed/ bcon 'grus kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su myi byed do// 
15a8('bum): bsam gtan rlom sems su myi byed/ bsam gtan gis rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su myi byed do// shes rab rlom seMs
15b1('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ shes rab kyis rlom sems su myi byed do// bdag shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems su myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang kis de rlom
15b2('bum): sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la myed de/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed pa'o// de ni 'di ltar rlom semasu
15b3('bum): byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myed de/ 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni pha rold tu phyind pa myed pa'o// de ni 'di ltar rlom sems su
15b4('bum): byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu bya nad pa la myed de/ 'di ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi/ nad pa ni pha rold tu phyind pa myed pa'o// de ni 'di
15b5('bum): ltar rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni bcoM na 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la myed de/ 'di ltar bcon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa ni pha rold du phyi nad
15b6('bum): ba myed pa'o// de ni 'di ltar rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni bsam gtan gI pha rol tu phyind pa la myed de/ 'di ltar bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa ni pa
15b7('bum): rol tu phyind pa myed pa'o// de ni 'di ltar rlom sems su byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la byed de/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
15b8('bum): ni pha rold tu phyi nad pa byed pa'o// de lta yin yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de yang ring tu song ba shes shing pha rol shes te/ des kyang rlom sems su byed cing / de sbyin
16a1('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi srung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// nA
16a2('bum): khrims kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pas yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i
16a3('bum): pha rold tu phyind pas yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am ra sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha
16a4('bum): ro lad tu phyind pas yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi ser lhung ste/ rnam pa thamasad cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 
16a5('bum): bcon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi ltungaste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par
16a6('bum): 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par
16a7('bum): 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par
16a8('bum): 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi bar myi lhung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// phyi ste// 
16b1('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su
16b2('bum): bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi
16b3('bum): sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi ser myi ltung ste/ 
16b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa
16b5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan/ thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltar ste/ 
16b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa
16b7('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam
16b8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ 
17a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
17a2('bum): phyi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
17a3('bum): gyi lung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
17a4('bum): mar gyi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong/ pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi
17a5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar gyi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mying phyi klas pa stong pa nyid kyang yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos
17a6('bum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi ser gyi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dngos po byed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos
17a7('bum): kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi san gyi phreng ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub pa 'gyur ro// ngob nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi
17a8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi mar gyi ltu ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
17b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
17b2('bum): sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ 
17b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ 
17b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa lerang sangs rgyas mas 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung
17b5('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nya/ na thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ 
17b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa
17b7('bum): nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
17b8('bum): pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid/ 
18a1('bum): kyang yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan bzhis yongs su byas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par
18a2('bum): 'gyur ro// chang byed pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi lu ba ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// gzugs byed
18a3('bum): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// rnam par
18a4('bum): tha rad pa brgyad kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi das 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thos cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mtharang
18a5('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang
18a6('bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang sprond pa myed pas yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam
18a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad
18a8('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzi nad rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
18b1('bum): kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 
18b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rab sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// myi 'jigs pa
18b3('bum): bzhis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su
18b4('bum): bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub pa ra 'gyur ro// byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung bas/ 
18b5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur/ ro// snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi
18b6('bum): sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan gyis
18b7('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
18b8('bum): rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// lam ga rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
19a1('bum): gyi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bas nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi// 
19a2('bum): sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// 
19a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam pa gnyis pa'o// 
19a4('bum): rab 'byor de de ltar gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa bshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba/ bsam gtan
19a5('bum): gi pha rold tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba/ brtson 'a grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba/ bzod/ pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pas yongs su bzung ba// tshul khris
19a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba// nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ 
19a7('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung
19a8('bum): pa/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ thog ma dang tha
19b1('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzu
19b2('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis
19b3('bum): yongs su bzung ba/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung pa// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yong su
19b4('bum): bzung ba/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ stobs rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ byang chub kyi yan lag
19b5('bum): rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ bsam gtan
19b6('bum): bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ tshad myed pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyis yong su
19b7('bum): bzung ba/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus yongs su bzung ba/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pas yongs su
19b8('bum): bzung ba mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su btung gting nge 'dzind rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/ de bzhin gshegs bI
20a1('bum): stobs bcus yongs su bzung ba/ myi 'jigs pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba/ byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba
20a2('bum): snying rje chen pos yongs su brdung ba sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba thams cad shes pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis
20a3('bum): yongs su bzung ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba/ de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ngo // rab 'byor da ji ltar na gang
20a4('bum): zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa khabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba yin zhe na/ rab 'byor nga 'di la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thog mar thabs dang / 
20a5('bum): ldan par sbyin pa yongs su gtong / thabs dang ldan patshul khrims srung / zabs dang ldan par bzod pa skom thabs dang ldan par brtson 'grus chom/ thabs dang
20a6('bum): ldan par bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug/ thabs dang ldan par shes rab bsgom zhing 'di ltar de bdag ni sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // sbyin pa ni 'di yongasu gtong ngo / 'di la sbyin
20a7('bum): ba yongs su gtong ngo // snum du myi sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khris ni 'di srung ngo snyam du myi mos so// 'di ltar bdag ni bzod pa sgom mo// bzod
20a8('bum): pa ni 'di sgom mo snyam tu myi sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni 'dzin 'grus com mo// brtson 'grus ni 'di bcom mo snyam cu gyi sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni bsam gtan pa/ 
20b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan 'di dag la snyoms par 'dug go snyam tu sems so// 'di ltar bdag ni shes rab sgom mo/ shes rab ni 'di sgom mo snyam du myi sems so// re
20b2('bum): sbyin pa rlom sems su myi byed/ sbyin pas rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do// de tshul khrims rlom sems su myi byed/ tshul khrims kyis
20b3('bum): rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do// de 'azod pa rloms du kyi byed payod pas rlom sems su myo byed/ bdag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi bye/ 
20b4('bum): ngo// de brtson 'grus rlom sems su myi byed/ bsngon 'grus kyis rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni bco na 'grus dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do// 
20b5('bum): de bsam gtan rlom sems su myi byed/ bsam gtan gis rlom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni bsam gtan ba'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do// de shes rab rlob
20b6('bum): sems su myi byed/ shes rab kyis chom sems su myi byed/ bdag ni shes rab dang ldan pa'o zhes rlom sems su myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de rnam par myi rtog pas
20b7('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de la rnam par rtog pa de dag myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de ni pha rold tu phyind pa myed pa'o/ 
20b8('bum): de ltar de rnam par myi rtog pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de la rnam par rtog pa de dag myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha ros
21a1('bum): tu phyi nad pa de ni pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'o// de ltar de rnam par myi rtog pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de la rnam par rtog pa de dag myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
21a2('bum): de ni'id ltar 'di lta ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa de ni pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'o// de ltar de rnam par myi rtog pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa de la rnam par
21a3('bum): rtog pa myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de ni pha rold tu phyind pa myed pa'o// de ltar de rnam par myi rtog pas
21a4('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyi nad pa de la rnam par to// ga pa de dag myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyi nad pa de ni
21a5('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa myed pa'o// de ltar de rnam par myi rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa de la rnam/ par rtog pa de dag myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
21a6('bum): 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa de ni pha rol tu phyi nad pa myed pa'o// de ltar yin la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de yang rib tu song ba shA
21a7('bum): shing / pha rol shes kyang de rlom sems myed de/ de sbyin pha rold tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bzod pa/ 
21a8('bum): pha rold tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan ki pha rold tu phyind pas yongs su bzung ba dang / 
21b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pas yongs su bzung ba dang // thabs mkhas yongs su bzung ba dang / nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyis yongs su// 
21b2('bum): bzung ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis yongs su b+hu dngang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / don dam pa stong
21b3('bum): pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bya dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
21b4('bum): kyis yongs su bya dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa s+ho// pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dor ba myed pa// stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rang bzhin
21b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / chos thos cad stong pa nyid kyis yongs su byA dang / rang gi mtshan nyi da stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / myi dmyig
21b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dngos po myeng pa'i
21b7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis yongs su byA dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / rdzu 'phru
21b8('bum): gi rkang pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dbang po rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / stobs rnams kyis yongasu bzung ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis
22a1('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas yongs su bzung ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / bsam gtan bzhis / 
22a2('bum): yongs su bzung ba dang / tshad myed pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad
22a3('bum): kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang
22a4('bum): smond pa myed pas yongs su bzung ba dang / mngon par shes pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / ting nge 'dzi nad rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang
22a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs btsus yongs su bzung ba dang / myi 'jigs
22a6('bum): pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yongs su bzung ba dang / byams pa chen pos yongs su bzung ba dang / snying rje chen
22a7('bum): pos yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang lam ki rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis yongs su
22a8('bum): bzung ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis yongs su bzung bsanyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi ltung ste/ rnam pa
22b1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // // shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa stong phrag brgya pa las
22b2('bum): le'u sum bcu drug pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la'i skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lngas
22b3('bum): dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la slab par bgyi/ ji ltar bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nad
22b4('bum): ba la slab par bkyi/ ji ltar batshon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la slab par bgyi/ ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la slab par
22b5('bum): bgyi/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la slab par bkyi ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa la slab par bgyi// bcom ldan
22b6('bum): 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab 'byor de 'di la las dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / 
22b7('bum): bsam gtan ka pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bsgrub par 'dod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind
22b8('bum): pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bslab par 'dod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa la bslab par 'dod pas dge' bi'
23a1('bum): bshes gnyen gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond pa/ bsam gtan gI pha rold tu phyind pa stond pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond pa
23a2('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa ston dra ba/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa stond pa/ de dag la bstend par bya'o// bsnyend par bya'o// 
23a3('bum): bsnyen bkur bar bgyi/ de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di lta ste/ tshur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa ka dang gang byin pa de thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
23a4('bum): chub tu yongs su sngos shig/ chur rigs kyi bu tshul khrims gang dang kang srung ba de thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig
23a5('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu bzod pa gang dang gang bsgrub pa de tham sa cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig/ tshur rigs kyi bu brtson 'grus
23a6('bum): gang dang gang chom pa de thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig/ tshur rigs kyi bu bsam gtan klu dang kang la snyoms par 'jug pa de thams
23a7('bum): bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig/ chur rigs kyi bu shes rab gang dang gang bsgom pa de thams cad bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
23a8('bum): yongs su sngos shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig/ tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ 'du shes su rtog par ma
23b1('bum): byed cig/ 'du byed du rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ myig tu rtog par ma byed cig/ rna bar rtog par ma byed cig/ snar rtog par ma byed cig/ lcer
23b2('bum): rtog par ma byed cig/ lus su rtog par ma byed cig/ yid du rtog par ma byed cig// gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig/ smar rtog par ma byed cig/ trir rtog par ma byed cig
23b3('bum): ror rtog par ma byed cig/ reg tu rtog par ma byed cig/ chos su rtog par ma byed cig/ myig gi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed
23b4('bum): cig/ sna'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ lce'i rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ lus kyi rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ yid kyi rnam par
23b5('bum): shes par rtog par ma byed cig// myig gi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ rna ba'i 'dus te re/ ga par rtog par ma byed cig/ sna'i 'dus te reg par rtog
23b6('bum): bar ma byed cig/ lce'i 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cag/ lus kyi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ yid kyi 'dus te reg par rtog par ma byed cig/ myig
23b7('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor bar rtog pa
23b8('bum): ma byed cig/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ lus kyi 'udus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
24a1('bum): rkyend kyis tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ chu'i khams su rtog par
24a2('bum): ma byed cig/ mye'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ rlung gi khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ nam mkha'i khams su rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam par shes pa'i khams su rtog par
24a3('bum): ma byed cig/ ma rig par rtog par ma byed cig/ 'du byed du rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam par shes par rtog par ma byed cig/ mying dang gzugs su rtog par ma byed cig/ skye mche
24a4('bum): drug tu rtog par ma byed cig/ reg par rtog par ma bye da cig/ tshor bar rtog par ma byed cig/ sred par rtog par ma byed cig/ le nad par rtog par ma byed cig
24a5('bum): srid par rtog par ma byed cig/ skye bar rtog par ma byed cig/ rga shir rtog par ma byed cig// rig sa kyi bu khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
24a6('bum): chub sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind par rtog par ma byed cig/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind par rtog par ma byed cig/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind par rtog par ma byed cig
24a7('bum): baphon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind par rtog par ma byed cig/ bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind par rtog par ma byed cig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind par rtog par ma
24a8('bum): byed cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nang stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ phyi stong pa nyid tu rtog par ma byed cig/ phyi
24b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid tu rtog par ma byed cig/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ chen po stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ don ngan pa stong pa nyid tu rtog byar ma byed cig/ 
24b2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid tu rtog par ma byed cig/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
24b3('bum): stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid tu rtog par ma byed cig/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid tu rtog par ma byed cig/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rtog par ma
24b4('bum): byed cig rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tu rtog par ma byed cig/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed ci ga/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig/ 
24b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tu rtog par ma byed cig/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du rtog par ma byed cig// rigs kyi bu khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
24b6('bum): byang chub dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ yang dag par spong ba rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams su rtog par ma byed/ 
24b7('bum): cig/ dbang po rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ stobs rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag/ 
24b8('bum): brgyad par rtog par ma byed cig/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ bsam gtan bzhir rtog par ma byed cig/ tshad myed pa bzhir rtog par ma cig
25a1('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam par tha ra da pa brgyad tu rtog par ma byed cig/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par/ 
25a2('bum): 'jug pa dgum rtog par ma byed cig/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed par rtog parlam byed cig/ mngon par zhes pa rnams su rtog par ma
25a3('bum): byed cig/ ting nge 'dzind rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams su rtog par ma byed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur rtog par ma byed cig/ myi 'jigs
25a4('bum): ba bzhir rtog par ma byed cig/ so so yang dag par ro/ ga pa bzhir rtog par ma byed cig/ byams pa chen po rtog par ma byed cig/ snying rje chen por rtog par ma byed cig
25a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du rtog par ma byed cig/ thams cad shes pa nyid du rtog par ma byed/ cig/ lam kI rnam pa shes pa nyid du rtog par ma byed
25a6('bum): cig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid tu rtog par ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yongs su ma brtags pa'i gzugs ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob
25a7('bum): par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags 'du shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob
25a8('bum): par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'du byed ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
25b1('bum): pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i myig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
25b2('bum): nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma btags pa'i sna ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i lce ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par
25b3('bum): byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i lus ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do/ 
25b4('bum): yongs su ma brtags pa'i gzugs ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma pa rtags pa'i sgra ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
25b5('bum): thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i dri ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed pa do yongs su ma brtags pa'i ron nim pa thams cad
25b6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i reg ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i chos ni rnam pa thams cad
25b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma btags pa'i myig kyi rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma btags pa'i rna pa
25b8('bum): rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i sna'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do/ 
26a1('bum): yongs su ma brtags pa'i lce'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa
26a2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i myig
26a3('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do/ 
26a4('bum): yongs su ma brtags pa'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa' ni rnam
26a5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa// ni rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid thob par byed do// 
26a6('bum): yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa' ni rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid thob par byed do sa su brtag pas myig go 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad
26a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su
26a8('bum): ma brtags pa'i sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis ro
26b1('bum): ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do/ 
26b2('bum): yongs su ma brtags pa'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma btags pa'i sa'i khams ni rnam pa thams
26b3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pI chu'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i mye'i khams ni rnam pa thos
26b4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma bar+Nadags pa'i rlung gi khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i nam
26b5('bum): mkha'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par
26b6('bum): byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i ma rig pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'du byed ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par
26b7('bum): byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par shes pa' ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i mying dang gzugs ni rnam pa thams cad
26b8('bum): mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i skye mched drug ni rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i reg pa ni rnam pa thos
27a1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshor ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i sred pa ni rnam pa
27a2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i lend pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i srid pa ni rnam pa thos
27a3('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i skye ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// ma yongs su ma brtags pa'i rgashi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
27a4('bum): pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtag
27a5('bum): ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa ni rnam pa
27a6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma
27a7('bum): bak+ka pa'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ni rnam pa thams cad
27a8('bum): mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i nang stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i phyi stong pa nyid ni rnam
27b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i stong
27b2('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i chen po stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasasu
27b3('bum): ma brtags pa'i don dam pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
27b4('bum): thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi da thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i mtha'
27b5('bum): sa 'das pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i thorga/ ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
27b6('bum): pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rang bzhin sngo
27b7('bum): pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do
27b8('bum): yongs su ma brtags pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni
28a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// 
28a2('bum): yongs su ma brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rnam pa
28a3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa 'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu
28a4('bum): ma brtags pa'i yang dag par spong ba rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasu ma brtags pa'i rdzu 'phrul ki rkang pa rnams ni rnam pa
28a5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su brtags pa'i dbang po rnams ni rnam pa thams cadamakhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma
28a6('bum): brtags pa'i stobs rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
28a7('bum): pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid thob param byed do// yongs su ma brtags
28a8('bum): pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i bsam gtan rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
28b1('bum): thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshad myed pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug/ 
28b2('bum): pa rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma
28b3('bum): brtags pa'i mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa
28b4('bum): nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa ni rnam da pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i mngon par shes pa rnams ni rnam pa
28b5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongasasu ma brtags pa'i ting nge 'dzind rnams ni rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su
28b6('bum): ma brtags pa'i gzungs kyi sgo rnams rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
28b7('bum): pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i myi 'jigs pa bzhi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i so so yang dag par rig/ 
28b8('bum): pa bzhi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i byams pa chen po ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su
29a1('bum): ma btags pa'i snying rje chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni rnam pa thams/ 
29a2('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i thams dkyi bani pa k+She ni thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad
29a3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// yongs su ma brtags pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par byed do// rigs kyi bu gzugs la 'dod pa
29a4('bum): ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni gzugs so// rigs kyi bu tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed
29a5('bum): pa ni tshor ba'o// 'du shes la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni 'dushes so kyis 'du byed la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci
29a6('bum): phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa byed pa ni 'du byed do/ rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rnam par shes pa'o// 
29a7('bum): myig la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni myig ko/ rna ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni
29a8('bum): rna ba'o// sA la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod pa myed pa ni sna'o// lce la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni sri'o// 
29b1('bum): lus la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni lus so// yid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi 'dod pa myed pa ni yid do// 
29b2('bum): gzugs la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni gzugs so// sgra la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni smra'o// 
29b3('bum): dri la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni tri'o// rol 'dod pa ma skyed cag/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni ro'o// reg la 'dod pa
29b4('bum): ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa ni reka ko/ chos la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyi ra zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa'i ni chos so/ 
29b5('bum): myig kI rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de 'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni myig / rnam par shes pa'o// rna bu'i rnam par shes pa la 'dod
29b6('bum): pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi
29b7('bum): bu 'dod pa myed ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma snyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// 
29b8('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma
30a1('bum): skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
30a2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o// 
30a3('bum): sA'i 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig
30a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod
30a5('bum): pa myed pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// ya kyi 'dus te reg pa la 'dod pa skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig/ sa kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// / 
30a6('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i
30a7('bum): lus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// sA'i 'dus te reg
30a8('bum): ba'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis/ 
30b1('bum): tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o/ 
30b2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khas
30b3('bum): la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe nas/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni sa'i khams so// chu'i khams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed
30b4('bum): pa ni chu'i khams so// mye'i khams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa mye da pa ni mye'i khams so// rlung gi khams la 'dod pa ma
30b5('bum): skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod po myed pa myed pa na rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i mas la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
30b6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rnam par shes
30b7('bum): pa'i khams so// ma rig pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni ma rig pa'o// 'du byed la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe
30b8('bum): narigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cag/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rnam par shes pa'o// myi da
31a1('bum): gzugs la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni mying dang gzugs so// skye mched drug la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
31a2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni skye mched drug go/ reg pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni reg pa'o// tshor ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ 
31a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni tshor ba'o// sred pa myed pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed yin sred pa'o// lend pa la 'dod pa/ 
31a4('bum): mang bskyed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa skye da pa ni lend pa'o// srid pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni srid pa'o// 
31a5('bum): skye ba la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni skye ba'o// rga shi la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa
31a6('bum): myed pa ni rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'o// tshul
31a7('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la
31a8('bum): 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni 'azod pa'i pha rol tu phyi dad pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir/ 
31b1('bum): zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni 'tshon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed
31b2('bum): pa ni bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'o// 
31b3('bum): nang stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod
31b4('bum): pa myed pa ni phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni phyi nang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa
31b5('bum): nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
31b6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 
31b7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid la 'dod pa sa skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ 
31b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod
32a1('bum): pa myed pa ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni thog ma dA/ 
32a2('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la 'dod
32a3('bum): pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod/ 
32a4('bum): pa myed pa ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi man nyid stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid
32a5('bum): stong pa nyid do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed
32a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe
32a7('bum): na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la 'dod pa mu skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni
32a8('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cika/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rags kyi bu 'dad pa myed pa na dran pa nye bar gzhag
32b1('bum): pa rnams la 'dod pa ma spyad cag/ de ca' phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de mi
32b2('bum): 'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa
32b3('bum): ni rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni dbang po rnams so// stobs rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig
32b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed
32b5('bum): pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa lam yan lag brgyad pa yi 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'o phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni 'phags
32b6('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la 'dod pa skye cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan rnaMs
32b7('bum): la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni bsam gtan rnams so/ tshad myed pa rnams la 'dod pa skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod/ 
32b8('bum): pa myed pa nin byed pa rnas so/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
33a1('bum): pa rnams so// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad do/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i
33a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong
33a3('bum): pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang spond pa myed pa la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang
33a4('bum): smond pa myed pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzind rnams la
33a5('bum): 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'dod pa myed pa ni ting nge 'dzind rnams so// gzungs kyi/ sgo rnams la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
33a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la 'dod pa ma skyed ci ni de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni de
33a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// myi 'jigs pa bzhi la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni myi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag
33a8('bum): par rig pa bzhi la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de
33b1('bum): 'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa nI byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos
33b2('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la 'dod pa mi skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// thams cad shes pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed
33b3('bum): cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni thams cad shes pa nyid do// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa
33b4('bum): ni lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la 'dod pa ma skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'dod pa myed pa ni rnam pa thams
