95b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lago cha de ni gzugs dang breld pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga gzugs kyang shi nad tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas
95b4('bum): de'i phyir go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'o go cha de ni tshor ba dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
95b5('bum): rab 'byor da tshor ba yang shaM nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dam mgo cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de nisatshor ba dang 'breld pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da bya
95b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'du shes dang brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'du shes nyid kyang ga nad tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed
95b7('bum): pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni 'du shes dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'du byed dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
95b8('bum): rab 'byor de 'du byed kyang shi nang tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir/ ko cha de ni 'du byed dang / 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems
96a1('bum): dpal sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe sa/ rab 'byor nga rnam par shes pa yang shi nang tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha ya / 
96a2('bum): byed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'igo cha de ni myig dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ 
96a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dmyig kyang zhi nad tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni myig dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de byang chub ses
96a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rna ba dang 'brel pa/ ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da rna ba yang shi nad tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i ko cha yang myed pas
96a5('bum): de'i phyir ko cha de ni rna ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'i go cha de ni sna dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe
96a6('bum): na rab 'byor da sna dang shind tu byed la byang chub sems dpa'i ko cha yang myed pas de'i phyir ko cha de ni sna dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems
96a7('bum): dpa' chen po'i ko cha de ni lce dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da lce yang sha nid tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni lce dang 'bres
96a8('bum): pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'i ko cha de ni lus dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da lus kyang shin tu myed la/ 
96b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni lus dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko de ni yid dnga'abrelang pa
96b2('bum): yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da yid kyang shin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni yid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub
96b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga gzugs kyang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas// de'i
96b4('bum): phyir go cha de ni gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sgra dang 'brel ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
96b5('bum): rab 'byor da sgra yang shind tu byed la byang chub sems dang / 'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni sgra dang 'brel/ pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems
96b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko cha de ni dri dang 'brel pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga dri yang shind tu byed la byang chub sems dpa'i ko cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir ro// 
96b7('bum): cha de ni dri dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'i go cha de ni ro dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga ro yang shin tu
96b8('bum): myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni ro dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni reg
97a1('bum): dang 'brel pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de reg kyang shind tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni reg dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// 
97a2('bum): rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni chos dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de chos kyang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ 
97a3('bum): de'i phyir go cha de ni chos dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni myig gi rnam par shes pa dpa' bre lad pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
97a4('bum): 'byor dmyig gi rnam par shes pa yang shind tu myed la byangachub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni myig gi rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// 
97a5('bum): rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin/ te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da rna ba'i rnam par shes
97a6('bum): pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang shi nad tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes
97a7('bum): pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 
97a8('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa yang shi nad tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir ko cha de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de byang chub
97b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'igo ma de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga lce'i rnam par shes pa yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i
97b2('bum): go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni lus kyi rnam par shes
97b3('bum): pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang shi nad tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir ko cha de ni lus kyi rnam par shes
97b4('bum): ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
97b5('bum): 'byor nga yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang shi nad tu myed la byad chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// / 
97b6('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byig gi 'dus te reg pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te reg pa
97b7('bum): shirang tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir ko cha de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems
97b8('bum): dpa' chen polago cha de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i ko
98a1('bum): byed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni snga'i 'dus te/ 
98a2('bum): reg pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang shind tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni snga'i 'dus te reg
98a3('bum): ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'igo cha de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
98a4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni lce'i 'dus te re ga pa dang 'breld pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
98a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po li go cha de ni// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i// phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang shin
98a6('bum): tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
98a7('bum): chen po'i go cha de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang shind tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ 
98a8('bum): de'i phyir ko cha de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
98b1('bum): dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dmyig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni myig gi 'dus te
98b2('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po li go cha de mi na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang 'brel pa ma yin
98b3('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang shi nang tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis/ 
98b4('bum): tshor ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byord byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go ma de ni snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang 'brel pa ma ni
98b5('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang shi nad tu myed la/ byang chub ses dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni sna'i 'dus te reg
98b6('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'go cha de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang 'brel pa
98b7('bum): yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
98b8('bum): kyis tshor ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lago cha de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ 
99a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang shind tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
99a2('bum): rkyend kyis tshor ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ 
99a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend
99a4('bum): kyis tshor ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sa'i khams dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir
99a5('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor da sa'i khams kyang shi nad tu myed la byad chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de/ ni sa'i khams dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab
99a6('bum): 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha de ni chu'i khams dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chu'i khams kyang shin tu myed la byang chub sos
99a7('bum): dpa'i go cha de yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni chu'i khams dang 'breld pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mye'i khams dang 'brel
99a8('bum): pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dmye'i khams kyang 'i nang tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i ko cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni mye'i khams dang 'brel pa ma yin zhe rkyen
99b1('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko cha de ni rlung gi khams dpa'abrel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyi mdenas rlung gi khams kyang shi nad tu byed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang byed
99b2('bum): pas de'i phyir go ma de ni rlung gi khams dpa 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'al chen po'i ko cha re ni nam mkha'i khams dpa' brel pa ma yin te
99b3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga nam mkha'i khams kyang shi nang tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i ko cha yang myed pas de'i phyir ko cha de ni nam mkha'i khams dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
99b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po li go cha de ni na par shes pa'i khams dang 'breyang pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyi dmam/ rab 'byor de rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang shin tu myed
99b5('bum): la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir/ go cha de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams dpa' brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'
99b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni ma rig pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ma rig pa yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i ko cha yang myed pas de'i phyir
99b7('bum): go cha de ni ma rig pa dnga'abrel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'du byed dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhen
99b8('bum): rab 'byor 'du byed kyang gi nad tu byed la / byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang byed pas/ de'i phyir go ma de ni 'du byed dang 'breld pa ma yis zhes bya'o// rab 'byor dbyang chub po
100a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la go cha de ni rnam par shes pa dnga'abrel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor pa rnam par shes pa yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang skye/ 
100a2('bum): pas de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mying dang gzugs dang 'brel pa yin te/ de ci'i
100a3('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mying dang gzugs kyang shi nad tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni mying dang gzugs dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor/ 
100a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de skye mched drug dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de skye mched drug kyang shind tu myed la byang chub sems
100a5('bum): dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni skye mched drugadang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang // chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'igo cha de ni reg par
100a6('bum): 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da reg pa yang gi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed de'i phyir go cha de ni reg pa dang 'breld pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor// 
100a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko cha de ni tshor ba dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de tshor ba yang shind tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i
100a8('bum): phyir ko cha de ni tshor ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'go cha de ni sred pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab khyor
100b1('bum): sred pa yang shi na tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i ko cha yang myed pas de yi phyir go cha de ni sred pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go ma de ni
100b2('bum): le nad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga lend pa yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni lend pa dang 'breld pa ma yin zhes bya'o/ 
100b3('bum): rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni srid pa dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de srid pa dang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed
100b4('bum): pas de'i phyir go cha de ni srid pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya/ 'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni skye ba dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyi
100b5('bum): zhe dang / rab 'byor de skye ba yang shinang tu myed la byang chub seMs dpa'i ko cha yang byed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni skye ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems
100b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'igo cha de ni rga shi dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da rga shi yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i ko cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni rga shi dang
100b7('bum): 'brelang pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lago cha de ni bdag dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga bdag kyang shinang tu byed
100b8('bum): la byang chub sems dpa'i ko cha yang myed pas de'i phyir ko cha de ni bdag dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko cha de ni sems can dang wen
101a1('bum): pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de sems can yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i ko cha de ni sems can dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub seMs
101a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go mde ni srog dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga srog kyang shind tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni srog dang 'bre
101a3('bum): pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni skye ba dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de skye ba yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub
101a4('bum): sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni skye ba dang 'a breld pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub ses/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gsol ba dang 'brel
101a5('bum): pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da gso ba bshin te/ phyed la byang chub sems dpa'i chen po go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni gso ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// 
101a6('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'go ma de ni skyes bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de skyes bu yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha
101a7('bum): yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni skye ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gang zag dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
101a8('bum): rab 'byor da gang zag kyang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni kang zag dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems
101b1('bum): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni shed can dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de shed can yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni shed can dang 'brel pa
101b2('bum): ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'igo cha de ni shed bdag dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da shed bdag kyang shin tu myed la byang chub
101b3('bum): sems dpa'i go cha yang byed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni shed bdag dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byed pa po dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ de ci'i
101b4('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byed pa po yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni byed pa po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub ses
101b5('bum): dpal sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshor ba po dang 'breld/ bye pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da tshor ba po 'a/ nga shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i ko cha yang myed pas
101b6('bum): de'i phyir go cha de ni tshor ba po dang 'breld pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni shes pa po dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
101b7('bum): rab 'byor de shes pa po yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni shes pa po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems/ dpa'
101b8('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mthong ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de mthong ba po yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha
102a1('bum): de ni mthong ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ del
102a2('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes
102a3('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen na 'dasand pas dus sun da ma pa da ga yin na rgyan 'dams kyi tshan pa sa kyis rgya
102a4('bum): dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dpa' brelang ba ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sngo ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa yang zhin tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha
102a5('bum): myed pas de'i phyir go ma de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin ga dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da bya// nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko cha de ni brtson
102a6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dpa' breld pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa yang shi nad tu myed na/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha
102a7('bum): yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni bsam gtan gi pha
102a8('bum): rold tu phyind pa dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni bsam
102b1('bum): gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko cha de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhen
102b2('bum): rab 'byor nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yang gi nang tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i gos yang byed pas de'i phyir ko cha de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
102b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyang shi nang tu myed la byang chub sems dba'i go cha yang byed
102b4('bum): pas de'i phyir go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin/ zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni phyi stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin/ 
102b5('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga phyi stong pa nyid kyang shin du tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir/ go cha de ni phyi stong pa nyid dang 'breld pa ma yin zhes bya'o// 
102b6('bum): rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go tshe de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang shi nad tu myed la byang chub seMs
102b7('bum): dpa'i go cha yang byed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni stong pa nyid stong pa
102b8('bum): dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang shi nad tu byed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha de ni chen po stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// / 
103a1('bum): rab 'byor pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag ma ni chen po stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor pa chen po stong pa nyid kyang shi nang du myed la
103a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas phyir go ma de ni chen po stong pa nyid dang 'breld pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko cha de ni don dam pa stong pa
103a3('bum): nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid dang
103a4('bum): 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'dus byasastong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
103a5('bum): rab 'byor nga 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang shind tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go/ cha de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes
103a6('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dnga'abrel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'dus ma byas stong pa
103a7('bum): nyid kyang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa'
103a8('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i ko ma de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gnad tu myed la/ byang chub
103b1('bum): sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir ko cha de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang 'brelang ba ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni thog ma
103b2('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dpa'abrel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni
103b3('bum): thog ma dang bla ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ 
103b4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang shind tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go ched ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pam/ 
103b5('bum): yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'asems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid de// nga 'brelang pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
103b6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpe'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyi da dang 'breld pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da bya/ 
103b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ago cha de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang shi nad tu myed la
103b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang 'breld pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
104a1('bum): 'i go cha de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang shi nad tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go
104a2('bum): yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / 
104a3('bum): 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang shind tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir ko cha de mi dbyigs pa stong pa nyid dang 'gre
104a4('bum): pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de dngos
104a5('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang shi na tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni dngos po myed// pa stong pa nyid dang 'brelang pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab
104a6('bum): 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko cha de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir/ zhe na/ rab 'byor nga ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu myed
104a7('bum): la byang chub sems dpa'i go ma yang myed pas de'i phyir ko ma de ni bab nyid stong pa nyid dnga'abrel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha
104a8('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang zhin tu myed la/ byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang / 
104b1('bum): myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'breld pa ma yin zhes bya'o// 
104b2('bum): bam pa / rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang
104b3('bum): 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir ko cha de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
104b4('bum): rnams dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni ya dag par spong ba dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
104b5('bum): rab 'byor nga yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang shin tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i gosas byed pas de'i phyir ko cha de ni/ yang dag par spong ba dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya/ 
104b6('bum): rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go tshe de ni rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da rdzu 'phrulang gi rkang pa rnams kyang shi nad tu
104b7('bum): myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni rdzu 'phrulang gi rkang pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'an/ 
104b8('bum): cha de ni dbang po dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da dbang po rnams kyang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni dbang po rnams
105a1('bum): dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go mde ni stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byor de stobs rnams kyang
105a2('bum): shind tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin shes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byang
105a3('bum): chub kyi yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni
105a4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pogo ched ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel
105a5('bum): pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'phag/ sa pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang shi nad tu myed la bya/ chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni
105a6('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'breld pa'i ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang 'brel
105a7('bum): pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang shind tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang
105a8('bum): 'breld pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni bsam gtan dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da bsam
105b1('bum): gtan rnams kyang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni bsam gtan dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems
105b2('bum): dpa' chen po 'i go cha de ni tshad myed pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da tshad myed pa yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas pa'i phyir go cha de ni tshad
105b3('bum): myed pa dang 'breld pa ma yin no// rab 'byor du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang 'breld pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
105b4('bum): rab 'byor nga gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang shind tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i ko cha yang myed pas de'i phyir ko cha de ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
105b5('bum): rnams dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ko cha de ni rnaM/ par tha rad pa'i brkyang dang 'brel da pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir
105b6('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor de rnam par thar da pa brgyad kyang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir ko cha de ni rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// 
105b7('bum): rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de mthar da kyis
105b8('bum): gnas par snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang shin tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir ko cha de ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang 'brel pa ma yin
106a1('bum): zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de mi rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ 
106a2('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa yang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam par thar
106a3('bum): ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa byed pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni mngon par shes pa dang 'brel pa ma
106a4('bum): yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga mngon par shes pa rnams kyang shi na tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang byed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni mngon par shes pa dang 'brelar
106a5('bum): pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems da/ pa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni ting nge 'dzind dang 'bre lad pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da ting nge 'dzin
106a6('bum): rnams kyang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni ting nge 'dzind dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byar nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na
106a7('bum): pa lag cha yang myed pas nga' phyar ka chad na gzungs kyi sku rnams dang 'bral pa ma yin zhes bya la// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'i go cha de ni gzungs kyi sgo
106a8('bum): rnams dang 'brelang pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang shind tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha na de
106b1('bum): ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir/ 
106b2('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor da de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang 'breld pa ma yin zhes bya'o// / 
106b3('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i kau cha de ni myi 'jigs pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang shind tu myed la byang chub seMs
106b4('bum): dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir ko cha de ni myi 'jigs pa rnams dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni
106b5('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha
106b6('bum): yang myed pas de'i phyir ko cha de ni so so yang dag par rig pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni byams pa chen po dang
106b7('bum): 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da byams pa chen po yang shin tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir ko cha de ni byams pa chen po dang 'brel pa ma
106b8('bum): yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da snying rje chen po yang shind
107a1('bum): tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas/ de'i phyir go cha de ni snying rje chen po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
107a2('bum): go cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas
107a3('bum): de'i phyir ko cha de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang 'brel dpa
107a4('bum): ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang shi nang tu myed la/ byang chub sems dang / 'i go ma yang byed pas de'i phyir go mde ni rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i
107a5('bum): 'bras bu dang 'brelang pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'argyarang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ 
107a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang shi nang tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa
107a7('bum): ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'og cha de ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhes// rab 'byor daphyir gyi 'om
107a8('bum): ba'i 'bras bu yang gi na tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang byed pas de'i phyir gyi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
107b1('bum): chen po'i go cha de ni dgra bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da dgra bcom pa nyid kyang shi nang tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir ko cha de ni dgra/ 
107b2('bum): bcom pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rang byang chub dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
107b3('bum): rang byang chub kyang zhin sde lnga bya sems dpa'i chan pa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i phyir go cha de ni rang byang chub dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go
107b4('bum): cha de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang 'brelang pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang shin tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i go cha yang myed pas de'i
107b5('bum): phyir ko cha de ni lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dang 'breld pa/ ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dang // 'a sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen// 
107b6('bum): pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byord rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang shi nad tu myed la byang chub sems dpa'i ko cha yang myed pas de'i phyir ko cha de ni rnam pa
107b7('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag gis
107b8('bum): sems can thams cad bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las bzla' bar bya'o zhes go cha bgos pa de dag gi go cha de ni chos thams cad dang 'breld pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
108a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po e rnams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla' bar bya'o// zhes go cha 'tshal ba des nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs
108a2('bum): par myi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlal bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung
108a3('bum): ba'i ka nas dang skabs ma mchis te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa 'tshams bcad de/ sems can gyi don tu go cha 'tshal// 
108a4('bum): pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlang pa/ rab 'byor da khyod kyis don kyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar
108a5('bum): go cha bgos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas su dogs par myi bya'o zhes smras so gsol pa/ bcom
108a6('bum): ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can nyi tshe nyung zad cig gi slad du go cha 'tshal pa ma lags ye shes nyung zad nyi rtse gcig gi slad tu ko cha 'tshal pa ma lags
108a7('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlal ba'i slad tu ko cha 'tshal da to// bcom ldan 'dra
108a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyi slad tu go cha 'tshal da to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' seHla pa/ rab 'byor da de de bzhin no// de de bzhin
108b1('bum): te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can nyung zad nyi ci'i don tu go cha bgos pa ma yin/ ye shes nyung zad nyi tse'i don tu go cha bgos pa ma yin gi/ rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpal
108b2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla' ba dang / thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes kyi don tu go cha bgos so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab
108b3('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di ni shi nad tu zab a ste/ de ni sus kyang sgom par myi bgyi/ ci yang bsgom par myi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab
108b4('bum): mo 'di la gang bsgom pa 'am bsgom par bgyi ba 'am/ gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub pa dmigs su ma mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol
108b5('bum): tu phyi nad pa sgom pa de ni nam mkha' sgom pa'o// bcom lda na 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa de ni chos thams cad bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
108b6('bum): 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa de ni ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa de ni yongs su
108b7('bum): 'dzind pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'as
108b8('bum): pa rab 'byor da 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa de gang bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
109a1('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'i'adi ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pan
109a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom
109a3('bum): pa 'di ni 'du bye slob na par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
109a4('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'ing ni myig bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa cwo 'ang ni rna bsgom pa
109a5('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa sgom pa 'di ni sna bsgo ma pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'did lta ste
109a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni lce sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes ra ba kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus bsgom pa
109a7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa sgom pa 'di ni yid sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
109a8('bum): pha rol tu phyi dad pa sgom pa 'di ni gzugs sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni sgra sgom pa rnam par sgom pa 'od/ 
109b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das lha ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'i nga ni dri sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni ro sgom pa nas/ 
109b2('bum): bar sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni reg bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
109b3('bum): sgom pa 'di ni chos sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni myig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// @
109b4('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sgom pa rnam par sgo ma bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
109b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'i lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni lce'i
109b6('bum): rnam par shes pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'odas 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pasgom pa 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom
109b7('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
109b8('bum): phyi nad pa sgom pa'i'ad ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'adi ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sgom
110a1('bum): pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni snga'i 'dus te reg pa sgom pa rnaM pas sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
110a2('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sus kyi
110a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom
110a4('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pasgom pa 'di ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
110a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'ang ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa
110a6('bum): 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba sgom pa rnaM bar sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sgom pa
110a7('bum): rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
110a8('bum): wa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinapa pa zhom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba sdom pa rnas par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa no
110b1('bum): ba 'di ni sa'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni chu'i khams sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
110b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni mye'i khams sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni rlung gi khams sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// 
110b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni nam mkha'i khams sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa'idi
110b4('bum): ni rnam par zhes pa'i khams sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom da ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni ma rig pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
110b5('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni 'du byed sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta/ ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni rnam par
110b6('bum): shes pa sgom pa rna spo ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni mying dang gzugs sgom pa ni ma par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
110b7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom
110b8('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sred pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa sgom pa 'di ni lend pa
111a1('bum): sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni srid pa sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
111a2('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa khrid ni skye ba sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rga shi sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
111a3('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can sgom pa rnam
111a4('bum): par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni srog sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
111a5('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'gro ba sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// btso/ ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sgom pa 'di ni gso ba bsgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom
111a6('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni skyes bu sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni kang
111a7('bum): zag sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni shed can sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
111a8('bum): rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni shed bdag sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni byed pa po sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom lda
111b1('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba po sgom pa rnam par sgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes pa po bsgom pa na/ 
111b2('bum): par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthong ba po sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
111b3('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rna
111b4('bum): par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
111b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi/ pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom// ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom/ 
111b6('bum): pa 'di ni bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha ro/ lang tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
111b7('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
111b8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom
112a1('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang po bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 
112a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid
112a3('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
112a4('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa
112a5('bum): 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par/ bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi/ pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
112a6('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom
112a7('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
112a8('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa
112b1('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
112b2('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid // 
112b3('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
112b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye b.ragazhag pa sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni
112b5('bum): yang dag par spong ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgo ma pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ 
112b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dbang po rnams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom
112b7('bum): pa 'di ni stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan
112b8('bum): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
113a1('bum): tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam gtan
113a2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshad myed pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
113a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni
113a4('bum): rnam par thard pa brgyad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
113a5('bum): pa dgul bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgo ma pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma mye/ 
113a6('bum): pa dang smond pa myed pa bsgom pa bsgo'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
113a7('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzind bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni
113a8('bum): gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
113b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni gyi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom/ 
113b2('bum): pa'i'adi ni ma so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirang pa bsgom pa 'di ni byams pa chen po bcom pa rnam par bsgom pa
113b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgo
113b4('bum): pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyang bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs
113b5('bum): pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom lda/ na 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ba/ sgom pa 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam
113b6('bum): bsgo ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
113b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dgra bcom pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang byang chub bsgom
113b8('bum): ba rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di
114a1('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
114a2('bum): bkA saHldag rab 'byor da de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ 
114a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni cho slo ba rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du shes bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
114a4('bum): rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ba'i yi the sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da'i di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa
114a5('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'adi ni myig skom/ pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab
114a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phye nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni sA bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
114a7('bum): rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lci bslob pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyidad pa bsgom pa 'di ni
114a8('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
114b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor pa 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni smra bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'khyor
114b2('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dri bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor pa 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni ro bsgom pa rnam par bsgo
114b3('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni reg bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni
114b4('bum): chos bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni myig gi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
114b5('bum): rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnamabar bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha ro// 
114b6('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ni sna'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam pa bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par 'gro/ 
114b7('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyirnyed pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
114b8('bum): rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni myig gi
115a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor pa 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rna 'o// rab 'byor pa 'di
115a2('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa
115a3('bum): 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
115a4('bum): rab 'byor da'adi lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bsgom par bsgodam pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
115a5('bum): phyi nad pa bsgom pa'ad ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di
115a6('bum): ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor pa'i di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis
115a7('bum): tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// 
115a8('bum): rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor dade 'di lta ste/ shes rab
115b1('bum): kyi mabo la tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor pa 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sa'i khams
115b2('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni chu'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab
115b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa'ad ni mye'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rlung gi khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom
115b4('bum): pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha'i khams bsgom pa rnam par bsgo/ rnam pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
115b5('bum): phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams bsgo/ ma pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni ma rig pa bsgom
115b6('bum): ba rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor pa 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'du byed bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
115b7('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa bsgom tshu sgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mying dang gzugs bsgom pa rnam par
115b8('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni skye mched drug bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
116a1('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni reg pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byorapa/ 
116a2('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sred pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor dade 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lend pa bsgom pa rnam
116a3('bum): par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni srid go dam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni
116a4('bum): skye ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rga shi bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste
116a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdagabasgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can
116a6('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni sgrog bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
116a7('bum): phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'gro ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni gso' ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom par ba'o// 
116a8('bum): rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni skyes bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ 
116b1('bum): gang zag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di ni shed can bsgom pa rna bar bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgon/ 
116b2('bum): ba 'di ni shed bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor pa'i da lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni byed pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab
116b3('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes pa po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab
116b4('bum): 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di
116b5('bum): ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rno bar bsgom pa tsho/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam pa
116b6('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
116b7('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam gtan ki pha rol
116b8('bum): tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byord
117a1('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor pa 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi sngon
117a2('bum): pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
117a3('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam
117a4('bum): par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa bsgom pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom/ pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab
117a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di 'dus ma byas
117a6('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor/ 
117a7('bum): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgom pa'i
117a8('bum): ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni chos thams cad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor/ 
117b1('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ma
117b2('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom par rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab
117b3('bum): 'byor pa 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni
117b4('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor dade 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha ro// da tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa
117b5('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor pa 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi/ pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ 
117b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyinang pa bsgom pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gi gang bathob pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dbang po / 
117b7('bum): ba rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyird pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes ra
117b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni #/ 
118a1('bum): pa'i bden pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor pa 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni bsam gtan bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor
118a2('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshad myed pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs myed
118a3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o myo 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par thard pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste
118a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni mthard kyi sa gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom pa rnam par ba/ sgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
118a5('bum): tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyidad dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa bsgom pa rnam pa ra bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
118a6('bum): tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor pa 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa rnam par
118a7('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzungs kyi sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
118a8('bum): pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni myi 'jigs pa bsgom pa rnam par
118b1('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lnga ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor pa'i dis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
118b2('bum): ba bsgom pa 'di ni byams pa chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni snying rje chen po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom mo// rab 'byor
118b3('bum): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di
118b4('bum): ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom ba'o// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgom pa 'di ni la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ 
118b5('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor pa 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o/ 
118b6('bum): rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
118b7('bum): bsgom pa 'di ni rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da'adi lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni lam ka rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par
118b8('bum): bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid bsgom pa rnam pa bsgom pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
119a1('bum): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces bka lasaHlad to// rab 'byord byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la mngon par
119a2('bum): chags pa myed dam zhes/ rab 'byor da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
119a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems
119a4('bum): dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grudas kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam
119a5('bum): zhes pa pon 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
119a6('bum): chen po bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// 
119a7('bum): rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la byang chub sems dpa'
119a8('bum): sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes sbyin pa'i
119b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la smon par chag/ 
119b2('bum): ba myed dam zhes nang stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi stong pa nyid la
119b3('bum): mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes phyi stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nang s+ho// 
119b4('bum): pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes phyi nang stong pa nyi de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su ba rtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems
119b5('bum): dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// 
119b6('bum): rab 'byor dade byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes chen po stong pa nyid la bya nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par
119b7('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes don dam pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
119b8('bum): bos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes 'dus byas stong pa nyid la byang
120a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags
120a2('bum): pa myed dam zhes 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' las 'das
120a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa
120a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su
