120a5('bum): brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dar ba myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon pa// ra chags pa myed dam zhes dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la byang
120a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam
120a7('bum): zhes rang bzhin stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad stong pa nyid
120a8('bum): la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes chos thams cad stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems
120b1('bum): dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byorapa/ 
120b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag pa/ 
120b3('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
120b4('bum): chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid stong pa nyi/ da la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
120b5('bum): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su ba rtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la mngon pa
120b6('bum): chags pa myed dam zhes dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran
120b7('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
120b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spong ba rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes yang dag par spong ba rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yosu
121a1('bum): brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrulang gi rkang pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes rdzu 'phrulang gi rkang pa rnams la byang
121a2('bum): no sa ga yo/ khyong rduchu la dang dbang po rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes dbang po rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
121a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes stobs rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byo
121a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi na lag rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes byin sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// 
121a5('bum): rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bya
121a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed de
121a7('bum): zhes 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams
121a8('bum): la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes bsam gtan rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
121b1('bum): tshad myed pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes tshad myed pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshe
121b2('bum): po gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes gzugs myed pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
121b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par tha rad pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes rnam par the rad pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag
121b4('bum): bar bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' ses dadapa' chen po mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes mthard kyis
121b5('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
121b6('bum): par tha rad ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa la byang chub seMs
121b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes mngon par
121b8('bum): shes pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzind rnams la mngon par chags
122a1('bum): bkyed ngapa zhes ting nge 'dzin rnams sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su btag par bya'o// rab 'byor dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi rna
122a2('bum): rnams la mngon par chags pa skyed dam/ zhes gzungs kyi sgo rnams sa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pom yongs su btag par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
122a3('bum): chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs rnams la mngon par chags pa myed dam shes de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor
122a4('bum): byang churnamam sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi 'jigs pa la mngon par chags pa skyed ngam zhes kyi 'jigs pa rnams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su bcas
122a5('bum): bar bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems da/ pa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par/ chags pa myed dam zhes so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
122a6('bum): la byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// / rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen byams pa chen po la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes byams pa/ 
122a7('bum): chen po la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes
122a8('bum): snying rje chen po la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon
122b1('bum): par chags pa myed dam zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos/ 
122b2('bum): cad shes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes thams cad shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/ 
122b3('bum): chen po lam gyi rnam pa zhes pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed ngam zhes las gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su brtag par bya'o// rab 'byor nga byang chub sos
122b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la mngon par chags pa myed dam zhes rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yosu
122b5('bum): phyir gyi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la myong pa'i tshe/ pha rol kyis smras pa dang / pha rol kyis bstan
122b6('bum): pa la snying por gyi lta 'am/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la myod pa'i tshe/ pha rol gyi dad pas myi 'gro 'am// byi
122b7('bum): myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin
123a1('bum): nam/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/ phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
123a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral ba ri ma gyur tam/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral bar
123a3('bum): ma gyur tam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral bar ma gyur da ta ma/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral bar ma gyurd tam/ bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa dang bral bar ma
123a4('bum): gyur da tam/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dang bral bar ma gyur da tam/ zhes yongs su brtag par bya ste// gal te phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
123a5('bum): bo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs myi snga skrag par myi 'gyur la/ zhum pa dang / yongs su zhum par myi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir nub
123a6('bum): par myi 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di thos par dkal la thos nas kyang 'dzind cing 'chang la klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed la de bzhin nyid
123a7('bum): tu nan tan tu byed na// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ni sngon gi lathar da yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di yongs su dris shing yongs su brtag pa byas
123a8('bum): pa dang / bzung zhing bcangs te kun chub par byas pa dang / tshul bzhin tu yid la byas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
123b1('bum): dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur la/ zhum par myi 'gyur yongs su zhum par myi 'gyur zhing / de'i yid phyir myi ldog la
123b2('bum): thos nas kyang khon du 'dzind cing 'chang la/ klog cing kun chub par byed de/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes
123b3('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di bstand pa'i tshe/ myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyur zhing / yongs su zhum par myi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
123b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag pabagyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sal pa// rab 'byord byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rnam pa thas
123b5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas shes rab kyi/ pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di brtag par bya'o// gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad
123b6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' saHlad pa/ rab
123b7('bum): 'byor nga stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nga mtshan ma myed pa la gzhol bri/ 
123b8('bum): bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor da smond pa myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems
124a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa'i na/ rab 'byor de nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
124a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor de skye ba myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo
124a3('bum): 'di la rtog pa yin// rab 'byor nga 'gag pa myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor
124a4('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byad chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyi nad pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin na pa/ rab 'byor de rnam par
124a5('bum): bya ba myed pa la gzhol ba byed pa'i bsam pas byang chubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyi nad pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor da de bzhin
124a6('bum): nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor de chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam khas
124a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor de yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' ses
124a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor da mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
124b1('bum): tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor nga bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di
124b2('bum): la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor de mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor
124b3('bum): rmi lam la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin// rab 'byor de gzugs rnyan la gzhol ba li bsam pas byang
124b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da da tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/ rab 'byor da sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpal sems dpa'
124b5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtogapa yin/ rab 'byor da smyig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
124b6('bum): tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin// rab 'byor da srul po la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no// 
124b7('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bas pa byas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur ba yin// 
124b8('bum): mtshan ma myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur// spond pa myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam
125a1('bum): bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur// nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' ses/ 
125a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur// skye ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu
125a3('bum): phyi nad pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur// 'gag pa ma mchis pa la gzhol lcims bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur
125a4('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byangachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur// de bzhin
125a5('bum): nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' / mas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur// chos kyi dbyings la gzhol bI
125a6('bum): bas bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems
125a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur// mnyam pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
125a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur// bsam gis kyi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam khas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rab
125b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur// mngon par 'du ba kyi ba ma mchis pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo lI
125b2('bum): la rtog par 'gyur/ rmi lam/ gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur// gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bam
125b3('bum): bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur// sgra brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
125b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur// smyig rgyu la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' se/ rnams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa zab mo 'di
125b5('bum): la rtog par 'gyur// sgyu ma la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rald tu phyind pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur// yul pa
125b6('bum): la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na
125b7('bum): gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/ chos pa la rtog pa lags sam// 'du shes la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam// myika la
125b8('bum): thog pa lags lam/ na ba la tog pa lags sam/ sA la cog pa lags sam/ lce la tog pa lags sam// lus la rtog pa lags sam// yid la rtog pa lags sam// gzugs la rtog pa
126a1('bum): lags sam/ sga la rtog pa lags sam/ dri la rtog pa lags sam/ rol rtog pa lags sas/ reg la rtog pa lags sam/ chos la rtog pa lags sam/ myika ki rnam par shes
126a2('bum): pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam// sna'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la
126a3('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam// myig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ sA'i 'dus te reg pa/ 
126a4('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ lce li 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa la gas sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa lags sam// myig gi
126a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa las
126a6('bum): sam/ sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa la/ 
126a7('bum): sam// sa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam// chu'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ mye'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ rlung gi khams la rtog pa lags sam/ nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa
126a8('bum): lags sam/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa lags sam/ ma rig pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'du byed la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par shes pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mying dang gzugs
126b1('bum): la tog pa lags sam/ skye mched drug la rtog pa lags sam/ reg pa la rtog pa lags sam/ tshor ba la rtog pa lags sam/ sred pa la rtog pa lags sam/ lend pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 
126b2('bum): srid pa la rtog pa lags sam/ skye ba la rtog pa lags sam/ rga shi la rtog pa lags sam// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa lags sam// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa
126b3('bum): lags sam/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa lags sam/ batshon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa lags sa
126b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa kha to// pa lags sam/ da nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags samaka stong
126b5('bum): pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog par lags sam/ chen po stong pa nyid la rtog par lags sam/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la tog/ pa lags sam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags
126b6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid
126b7('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ myi dmyigs
126b8('bum): pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa lags
127a1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rdzu 'phrul da gi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ dbang po rnams la rtog
127a2('bum): pa lags sam/ stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang pa la rtog pa lags sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnaMs
127a3('bum): la rtog pa lags sam/ bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa lags sam// tshad myed pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par thar
127a4('bum): pa rnams la rtog la lags so/ mthar da kyis gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon
127a5('bum): pa myed pa la rtog pa lags sam/ mngon par shes pa rnas la rtog pa lags sam/ ting nge 'dzind rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam
127a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ myi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ byams pa chen po la
127a7('bum): rtog pa lags sam/ snying rje chen po la rtog pa lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/ thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ lam gyi rnam
127a8('bum): pa shes pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rtog pa lags sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rab 'byor da byang chub sems dpa' sems
127b1('bum): dpa' chen po de ni gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du shes la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du byed la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// byig
127b2('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sna la rtog pa ma yin no// lce la rtog pa ma yin no// lus la rtog pa ma yin no// yid la rtog pa ma yin no// gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no/ 
127b3('bum): ska la rtog pa ma yin no// dri la rtog pa ma yin no// rol rtog pa ma yin no// reg la rtog pa ma yinam ca myig gi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin
127b4('bum): sA'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma
127b5('bum): yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la s+ho// 
127b6('bum): pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te rog pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rtog pa ma yin no// rna ba'i 'atus
127b7('bum): reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba rtog pa ma yin no// sA'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus nyi
127b8('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// sa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// chu'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// mye'i khams
128a1('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no// rlung gi khams la rtog pa ma yin no// nam mkha'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams la rtog pa ma yin no// ma rig pa la rtog pa ma yin no// 'du byed
128a2('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no// mying dang gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no// skye mched drug la rtog pa ma yin no// reg pa la rtog pa ma yin no// tshor ba la rtog pa ma yin no// 
128a3('bum): sred pa la rtog pa ma yin no// lend pa la rtog pa ma yin no// srid pa la rtog pa ma yin no// skye ba la rtog pa ma yin no// rga shi la rtog pa ma yin no// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa ma yi/ 
128a4('bum): no// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa ma yino// bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa la rtog pa ma yin no// batshon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la rtog pa ma yin no// bsam
128a5('bum): gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa la rtog pa ma yin no// shesarab kyi pha rol tu phyird pa la rtog pa ma yin no// nangastong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma
128a6('bum): yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// chen po stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// don dam pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// 'dus byas
128a7('bum): stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma lags so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma
128a8('bum): yin no// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la tog pa ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rton/ 
128b1('bum): pa ma yin no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
128b2('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// dbang po rnaMs
128b3('bum): la rtog pa ma yin no// stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rtog pa ma yin no// 'phags pa'i
128b4('bum): bden pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// bsam gtan rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// tshad myed pa rnams la rtog pa ma yi no// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog
128b5('bum): pa ma yin no// rnam par tha rad pa rnams la rtogs pa ma yi no// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs la rtog pa ma yin no// rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
128b6('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa la tog ma yin no// mngon par shes pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// ting nge 'dzind rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin
128b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// myi 'jigs pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// byams pa chen po la rtog pa sa
128b8('bum): yin no// snying rje chen por rtog pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no// thams cad shes pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rtogs/ 
129a1('bum): yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid la rtog pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor nga de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa de ni ru gyu sa byas
129a2('bum): rnam par ma byas gang nas kyang ba byas gang nas kyang ma 'ongs gang du yang ma yong / phyogs gang na yang myigangs yul gangam yang myi gnas/ gang na yang gyi gnas pa ste/ de la grangs kyi dbyigs so// 
129a3('bum): 'gro ga dang 'ong ba myi dmyigs so// gang la grangs myi dmyigs shing 'gro ba dang 'ong ba myi dmyigs pa de ni gang gis kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya bar myi nus te/ gzugs kyis ma yin no// tshor bas ma yin no// 
129a4('bum): 'du shes kyis ma yin no// 'du byed kyis ma yin no// rnam par shes pas ma yin no// myig gis ma yin no// rna bas ma yin no/ snas ma yin no// lces ma yin no// lus kyis ma yin no/ 
129a5('bum): yid kyis ma yin no// gzugs kyis ma yin no// smras ma yin no// dris ma yin no// ros ma yin no// reg gis ma/ yin no// chos kyis ma yin no// byig gi rnam par / 
129a6('bum): bas ma yin no// rna ba'i rnam par zhes pas ma yin no// sI'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no// lce'i rnam par shes pas ma yin no// lus kyi rnam par shes pas ma yin no// yid kyi rnam
129a7('bum): par shes pas ma yin no// myig gi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pas ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus
129a8('bum): te reg pas ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pas ma yin no/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas ma yin no// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas ma yin no// sna'i 'dus te che
129b1('bum): pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas ma yin no// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas ma yin no// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas ma yin no// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas ma yin/

129b6('bum): rol tu phyind pas ma yin no// nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// phyi stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// chen po stong pa 'i
129b7('bum): kyis ma yin no// don dam stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// thog/ 
129b8('bum): ma dang tha ma byed pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rang gi mtshan nyid sto/ 
130a1('bum): pa nyid kyis ma yin no// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no// ngos po myed pa'i ngas nyid stob pa nyid
130a2('bum): kyis ma yin no// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis ma yin no// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis ma yin no// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyis ma yin no// dbang po kyis rnams kyis ma yin no/

130a4('bum): rnams kyis ma yin no// tshad myed pa rnams kyis ma yin no// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma yin/ no// rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyis ma yin no// mthar kyis

130a7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis ma yin no// byams pa chen pos ma yin no// snying rje chen pos ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis ma yin no// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras

130b1('bum): pa nyid kyis ma yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyis ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// tshor ba nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/

131a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// snga'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// lus kyi 'dus

132a1('bum): pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa

132a3('bum): do ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang rnam pa thams cad
132a4('bum): mkhyend pa nyid do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang rnam pa thas cad mkhyend pa nyid do// rdzu 'phrulang gi rkang pa rnams kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// dbang po rnams kyang rnam pa thams cad

132a6('bum): nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// 'phags pa'o/ bden pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// bsam gtan nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// tshad myed
132a7('bum): pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// rnam par tha rad pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
132a8('bum): do// mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
132b1('bum): pa nyid do// mngon par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyedad pa nyid do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// 
132b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
132b3('bum): nyid do// byams pa chen po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// snying rje chen po nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad man+te
132b4('bum): pa nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gci
132b5('bum): pa'o// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du zhes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
132b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
132b7('bum): ba de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// myig gi de
132b8('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
132b9('bum): nyid kyi zhin nyid gang yin dod dpadan nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yi pa dang / rnam pa mams padas byed pa nyid kyi desani nyid gang yin padod de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gro 'de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang das thamams cad mkhyedang
133a1('bum): nyid kyi bzhin nyid ga du yin pa 'oni ba'in nyid gcig pa'o// sus kyi bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyim banan nyid kyad bzhin nyid gang yin
133a2('bum): ba de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kang
133a3('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
133a4('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid/ gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ro la de bzhin nyid
133a5('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de ba/ zhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
133a6('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// / 
133a7('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin/ 
133a8('bum): ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin
133b1('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sde'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus/ 
133b2('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
133b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi ga dI ba de ni
133b4('bum): nanyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhi na nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i 'dus
133b5('bum): te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid// gcig pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
133b6('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad man+de/ 
133b7('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
133b8('bum): nyid gcig pa'o byig gisu da rkyen kyi nga nyid ga ni pa nam sa ba bamam byed pa nyid kyi de zhi nyid ga yin pa demi de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
134a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
134a2('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lceli 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de ba'i
134a3('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
134a4('bum): nyid gcig pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshoraba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad ma nad pa nyid kAnga? yin bya de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 
134a5('bum): sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
134a6('bum): dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
134a7('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// nam
134a8('bum): kha pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kang+ka sbyin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par zhes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kang yin pa dang / 
134b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid kang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ka// 
134b2('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par shes
134b3('bum): pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
134b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa/ de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// skye mched drug gi de babazhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
134b5('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
134b6('bum): gcig pa'o// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
134b7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// lend pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid ga
134b8('bum): ba'or skye ba'i de bzhin nyid kang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin pa de de de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
135a1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
135a2('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bzod pa'i/ 
135a3('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang mi
135a4('bum): pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ga nga yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams
135a5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin
135a6('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 
135a7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
135a8('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
135b1('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid gang// 
135b2('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ 
135b3('bum): ba de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mtha' las pa stong pa nyid pa kyi de bzhin nyid ga/ 
135b4('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de/ bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// thog/ ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang // 
135b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi/ de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
135b6('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 
135b7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ka
135b8('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
136a1('bum): dngos po myed pa de'i hri sto pa 'i kyi de ban rje ba lji ba dang / rnab zas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de yi nyid / TIg+sa pa'o// 
136a2('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyi// 
136a3('bum): gcig pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ 
136a4('bum): ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin ni
136a5('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cadamakhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
136a6('bum): gcig pa'o// dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gapa yin parnab pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ka
136a7('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pi / 
136a8('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de byin
136a9('bum): nyid gcig pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa denam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// bsam gtan rnams kyi
136b1('bum): de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ga pa yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// tshad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin
136b2('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
136b3('bum): nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mthurd kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
136b4('bum): par 'jug pa dgu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thos cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// rnam par tha rid pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
136b5('bum): myed pa dang spond pa myed pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa/ dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang // yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// mngon par shes pa
136b6('bum): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
136b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid/ 
136b8('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
137a1('bum): ya gnyid gcig pa'o// kyi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ga pa yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ka pa yin pa mi de bzhin nyid gcig pa 'o// pa mo yang dag
137a2('bum): par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// byams pa chen pol de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
137a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// snying rje chen po 'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin de
137a4('bum): ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dre sa pa bcwo brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
137a5('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las// / bam po
137a6('bum): de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na pyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams/ lha rdzas kyi tsan dang gi phye ma dang / sA rdzas kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad po dang / 
137a7('bum): ku mud dang / pun nga ri ka mang po khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su 'thor bar gyurd to// gtor nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'a
137a8('bum): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 1'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na spyod pa lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
137b1('bum): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du
137b2('bum): gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang cho
137b3('bum): ba'o// 'du shes nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid 'du shes so// / 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
137b4('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// myig nyid rnam
137b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa nyid kyang myig go// rna ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang
137b6('bum): rna ba'o// sna nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce nyidarnam pa thas cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lce'o// / 
137b7('bum): lus nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lus so// yid nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yid do// 
137b8('bum): gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
138a1('bum): sna nyid do// dri nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang tri'o// ro nyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen de pa nyid kyang
138a2('bum): rolo/ reg nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang reg go// chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nga ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chos
138a3('bum): myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myig ki rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ 
138a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams
138a5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// lce'inirnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang s+ye'i rnam par shes po
138a6('bum): sus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa s+ho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
138a7('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi da par shes pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dum
138a8('bum): te reg pa'o// na ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa pa steng / rnam pa thams cad ma khye nad pa nyid kyang rna pa'i 'dus te reg pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
138b1('bum): mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg/ 
138b2('bum): pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ 
138b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myig
138b4('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te re dag pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa/ ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg
138b5('bum): pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyenadakyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
138b6('bum): kyis tshor ba'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'a
138b7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor
138b8('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam
139a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyab sa'i khams so// chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// mye'i khams nyid rnam/ 
139a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang mye'i khams so// rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams
139a3('bum): so/ nam mkha'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ 
139a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang ma rig po
139a5('bum): 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams
139a6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mying dang gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang mying dang gzugs so// skye mched drug nyid rna
139a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba
139a8('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// lend
139b1('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lend pa'o// srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba
139b2('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i
139b3('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam par thams cad mkhyend pa
139b4('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam/ pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
139b5('bum): nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
139b6('bum): tu phyind pa'o/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
139b7('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ 
139b8('bum): kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thos
140a1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa
140a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid kyang ma pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kya chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
140a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams
140a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'dus ma
140a5('bum): bya ba stong pa nyid do/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pathams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi/ kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha ma byed/ 
140a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma byed pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
140a7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam/ 
140a8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang
140b1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
140b2('bum): mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos
140b3('bum): po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
140b4('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dran pa nye b.ragazhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang
140b5('bum): dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrulang gi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid rnam pa
140b6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub
140b7('bum): kyi yan lag nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
140b8('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi
141a1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad myed pa nyid rnam pa thams
141a2('bum): mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang tshad myed pa rnams so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa steng/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzug
141a3('bum): myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par tha rad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dam pa thams cad mkhan papa nya rnam par tha rad pa rnams so// 
141a4('bum): mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par
141a5('bum): thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myedapa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
141a6('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams
141a7('bum): cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnamaso// 
141a8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// myi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend
141b1('bum): ba ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig
141b2('bum): pa rnams so/ byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang byams pa chen pa'o// snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa
141b3('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// 
141b4('bum): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// tshor ba'i de bzhin
141b5('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi sa su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// 'du shes kyi de bzhin te/ 
141b6('bum): gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su byed cing gnyis su byar myed do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
141b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa
141b8('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ri de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// myig gi de bzhin nyid kang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhye dad pa 'i/ 
142a1('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ka
142a2('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sna'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
142a3('bum): gnyis su byed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar/ 
142a4('bum): myed do// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thamasacad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyi dar gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// 
142a5('bum): yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// gzugs
142a6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rna
142a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// dri'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyedad pa nyid kyi
142a8('bum): de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// ro'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste// 
142b1('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed/ 
142b2('bum): chos kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhi
142b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed ning gnyis su byar myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
142b4('bum): yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing / gnyis su byar myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
142b5('bum): gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhi na nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhi
142b6('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar byed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
142b7('bum): gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
142b8('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhi
143a1('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid/ 
143a2('bum): gang yin pa dang rna ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam
143a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin
143a4('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin/ ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang / 
143a5('bum): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin ba dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
143a6('bum): ba de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
143a7('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ka yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi
143a8('bum): ba de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
143b1('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yi// 
143b2('bum): ba de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
143b3('bum): ba de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin la 'ang / rnam pa
143b4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhi na nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar byed do// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
143b5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myedacing gnyis su byar myed do// chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang / yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
143b6('bum): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
143b7('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing
143b8('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar
144a1('bum): myed do// rnam par shes cad mkhyen na kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'i ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis
144a2('bum): su byar myed do// ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// 'du byed kyi de
144a3('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
144a4('bum): ba dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing ka nyis su byar myed do// mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gangapa yi
144a5('bum): ba dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhiDI gang de ni de bzhi na nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thos
144a6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
144a7('bum): bde ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
144a8('bum): ste gnyis su byed ring gnyis su byar myed do// sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su byed

148a8('bum): cing mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bgyi ba'o// 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na gyod pa dang / gzugs yod pa na pyod pa'i/

149a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang reg ko/ chos nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nye/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chos so// myig gi rnam pa/
