149a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dres te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid/ rnam pa thams
149a7('bum): cad mkhyerang ba nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dul te reg pa'o// sA'i 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyedad pa nyid kyang sA'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyi
149a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang lce'i brgyas te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid
149b1('bum): kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor/ 
149b2('bum): ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mthe/ 
149b3('bum): pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rna pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba'o// sku'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye rad kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
149b4('bum): kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyerangag ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te ren
149b5('bum): ba'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyi sa tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis chos
149b6('bum): pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams nyid rnam pa thas/ 
149b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sa'i khams / chu'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa ste// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chu'i 'ams so// kye'i khams
149b8('bum): nyis nam la thams cad ma khye pa se rnam pa mams cad mkhye dang pa nyid kyang mye'i khams so// rlung gi khams nyid rnam pa thams cad ma khyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chu gi
150a1('bum): so// nam ma'a'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nam la la'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ 
150a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa'i yu lamis so// 'du byed nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyenapa
150a3('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mying dang gzugs nyid ni
150a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyi da kyang mying dang gzugs so// skye mched drug nyid rnam pa thos cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid skye
150a5('bum): mched drug go sa reg pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang reg pa'o// tshor ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
150a6('bum): pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// le dad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen / 
150a7('bum): pa nyid kyang lend pa'o// srid pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
150a8('bum): nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pazhas
150b1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu
150b2('bum): phyi nad pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid
150b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang bapon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thos
150b4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang bsam gtan ki pha rol tu phyind pa 'o// shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyind pa nyid rnam pa thams cang mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang
150b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid rnam pa
150b6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid / phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa
150b7('bum): nyid do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam
150b8('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas
151a1('bum): stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa 'o/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams sa
151a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha sa
151a3('bum): skyed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do// dor ba byed pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa rdzas
151a4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams da mkhyend pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad s+ho
151a5('bum): pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cadamakhyend pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtsha// na nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thos
151a6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa
151a7('bum): stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
151a8('bum): nyid kyang ngos nyid sto pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye
151b1('bum): gzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad
151b2('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po nyid rnam pa thams
151b3('bum): cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag/ 
151b4('bum): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye/ nad pa nyid byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa
151b5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag pa rgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang 'phags
151b6('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad byed pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyidaste/ rnam pa
151b7('bum): thams cad mkhyedad pa nyid kyang chad myed pa rnams so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye rad pa nyid kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa/ 
151b8('bum): 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par tha rad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rnam par tha rnyed pa rnams so// mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rna
152a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma byed pa dang
152a2('bum): smond pa byed pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'o// mngon par shes pa nyid rnam pa thams/ 
152a3('bum): cad mkhye nad pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzind rnams so/ 
152a4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhi na gshegs pa'i stobs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste
152a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// myi 'jigs pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa
152a6('bum): rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye rad pa nyid kung so mo yang dag par rig pa rnams so// byams pa chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhye dang / 
152a7('bum): pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang byams pa chen po'o// snying rje chen po nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos
152a8('bum): 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa rnams so// 
152b1('bum): bam // gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ 
152b2('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de
152b3('bum): ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
152b4('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de banyi na nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su rtse
152b5('bum): cing gnyis su byar byed do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de ban na nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su/ 
152b6('bum): byed cing gnyis su byar myed do// byig gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar/ 
152b7('bum): myed do// rna ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sna'i de bzhin
152b8('bum): nyid gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lce'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / 
153a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad ma khyedang pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar byed do// lus kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang nam
153a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// yid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
153a3('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
153a4('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sgra'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
153a5('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// tI'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa
153a6('bum): ste/ gnyis su byed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rol de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa deng ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyid
153a7('bum): su byar myed do// reg gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar byed do// chos kyi
153a8('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
153b1('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid na na
153b2('bum): spyod bzhis ljin ma de 'di dge 'i kye gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
153b3('bum): gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su byed ci
153b4('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin/ nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhye dad pa nyid kyi de ba zhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
153b5('bum): myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
153b6('bum): myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed
153b7('bum): cing gnyis su byar myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis
153b8('bum): byar myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar skye/ 
154a1('bum): nga/ sro'i 'dus te res pa'i de bzhin nyid gapa yin thar ngarnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin par ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar byed do// 
154a2('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ka yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// yid kyi 'dus
154a3('bum): ta rag pa lang bzhin nyid gas yin pa dam bzhin nyid gcag pa ste/ gnyis su kyad cang gnyis su byar kyang ngo// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnas pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid kyi
154a4('bum): bzhin nyid kang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi nas su myed cing gnyis su byar byed do// myig gi 'dus te reg da pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa
154a5('bum): cang mkhye nga ba nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin da gcig pa ste/ gnyis su byed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang
154a6('bum): ba dang rnam pa thams rdzam khyend pa 'i kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ka/ 
154a7('bum): yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar byed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye rad kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid
154a8('bum): gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams
154b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ka pa yin pa dang rnam pa
154b2('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
154b3('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
154b4('bum): ka yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cir gnyis su byar myed do// mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin/ 
154b5('bum): ba de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing ga/ nyis su byar myed do// rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin// ba dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kar yi
154b6('bum): ba de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar byed do// nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
154b7('bum): nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gci
154b8('bum): pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su rtse
155a1('bum): cing gnyis su byar byed do/ 'du byed kying pa'in cing gapa min pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa nyid kyi bzhin nyid gang yin pa na de bzhin nyid gcig pa la/ gnyis su byed ci
155a2('bum): gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kang ba dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// / 
155a3('bum): mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// skye mched drug gi de
155a4('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi/ de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// reg pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
155a5('bum): yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa/ 
155a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sred pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i/ 
155a7('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar myed do// lend pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
155a8('bum): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gang yin pa/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// srid pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid
155b1('bum): gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// skye ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis// 
155b2('bum): byed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rga shi'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// 
155b3('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// tshul khros
155b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam patha mas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kar yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// 
155b5('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin// ba de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyisu
155b6('bum): byar myed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid kar yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing
155b7('bum): gnyis su byar byed do// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su
155b8('bum): myed cing gnyis su byar byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyisu
156a1('bum): myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyi su
156a2('bum): byar myed do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// phyin pa stong
156a3('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhi
156a4('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhi na nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste// gnyis su mye da cing gnyis su byar byed do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
156a5('bum): gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin// nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyi su mye// da cing gnyis su byar myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhi
156a6('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kang
156a7('bum): yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin par
156a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar byed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kang yin pa dang rnam
156b1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de yi de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// thog ma dang tha ma mye pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad maste/ 
156b2('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar byed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin
156b3('bum): nyid kang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su byed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
156b4('bum): bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
156b5('bum): de ni de bzhin nyid gaN+DIg pa ste klu rlung gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid da kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ 
156b6('bum): gnyis su byed cing gnyis su byar myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su skye/ 
156b7('bum): cing gnyis su byar myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste// gnyis su myed cing gan/ 
156b8('bum): su byar myed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// 
157a1('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste// gnyis su myed cing gnyi su byar/ 
157a2('bum): byed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar
157a3('bum): myed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rdzu 'phrul
157a4('bum): mi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar byed do/ 
157a5('bum): dbang po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dam rnam pa sa u mas cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ri mi bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis
157a6('bum): su myed cing gnyisu byar byed do// slob sa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ga ba yin pa nga rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kang yin pa ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed ci gnyis
157a7('bum): byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ka yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar
157a8('bum): raM/ mags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de banini byed gang yin pa dang rnas pa thams cad sa da pa nyid kyi bzhin da ga yin pa ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ sa skye kyi gnyi sa / 
157b1('bum): ro/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// bas/ 
157b2('bum): dge/ gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su byed cing gnyis su byar myed do// tshad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin
157b3('bum): nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de
157b4('bum): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing ka/ nyis su byar myed do// rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
157b5('bum): gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi/ dgang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms
157b6('bum): 'dug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rnam par tha rad pa'i rnam/ 
157b7('bum): pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ka pa yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byang
157b8('bum): byed po/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi 'i bzhin nyid gapa yin pa ngarnam pa thams cad mkhye nga pa nyid kyi ni bzhin nyid gcigs rtse / gnyis pa byed cing gnyis su byar byed do// ting 'dzind nams kyi 'di sa
158a1('bum): gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid kyi bzhin nyid ga sim pa de mi de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byas byed do// gsungs kyi sgornams kyi'i bzhin nying ka pa'i/ 
158a2('bum): ba dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
158a3('bum): dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams
158a4('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa zas
158a5('bum): cang mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid// gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad
158a6('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste// gnyis su byed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chas ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams
158a7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su byed cing gnyis su byar myed do// rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
158a8('bum): ba nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar byed do// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
158b1('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin
158b2('bum): nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de
158b3('bum): kho 'i mtho'o// rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid ka pa yin pa dong rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// 
158b4('bum): wa mo rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ga sim la dparnam / thams cas la khye nad pa nyid kyi de bzhin gang yin de ni me pa'i dan nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// 
158b5('bum): rgyu rab tu zhugs pa'i 'thom la me pa'i gi rnam pa rnams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi po 'anyin nyid gam yini ba de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste// gnyis su myed cing gnyis
158b6('bum): 'i thu mag brnapa su pa badzin ga'as na par me pazhin nyid ka
158b7('bum): kyang nga/ byar bya'am po la bathod ga sem po nga dam byams pa mkhyen gyid kyi pas kyang ga yin pa som bzhis kyang sa sa byar kyad du nas su
158b8('bum): yang than kyi ga pasims pa zhes pa ma sem par ma byang ma phyi khyim pan ma nyid gapa yin pa dan dri bzhin cad gcags sung/ gnyis su myad pa gcis bu kya bye da rang sangs rgyas kyi ba'i nga
159a1('bum): ga yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa he/ gnyis su byed cing gnyis su byer myod do// byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin nyid gang ni
159a2('bum): ba dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad
159a3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su byar myed do// lha'i bu dag don kyi dbang de gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin yang chung ba
159a4('bum): la thugs gzhold te/ chos bstand pa la gzhol ba ma yin/ no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshe gas pa rnams kyi chos byang chub 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la 'od/ 
159a5('bum): tu chung par dka' zhing brtag tu myed la/ brtog ge'i gyod yul ma yin te/ zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig ra bya ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba
159a6('bum): ste de ni lus kyang mngon par sangs rgyas nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas// kar yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas te/ gang la gnyis su kun nas sgrub myed pa de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do// 
159a7('bum): lnga'i bu dag nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos zab bo// lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag yang dag pa'i/ 
159a8('bum): mtha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag bsam gis myi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab mo// lha'i bu dag mtha' yas mu myed zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag
159b1('bum): 'ong ba dang 'gro ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag kyi skye ba'i gag pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa myed pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag kun nas nyon mongs pa byed pa dang / 
159b2('bum): rnam par byang ba myed pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa myed pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'ang zab bo// lha'i bu dag mngon par byang chub pa myed pa dang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa myed pa
159b3('bum): zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lA'i bu dag sems can zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag srog zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ 
159b4('bum): lha'i bu dag 'gro ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu ngag ka so ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag skyes bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag gang zag
159b5('bum): zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag shed can zab ba'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag shed bdag zab/ pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag byed pa po zab pa'i
159b6('bum): phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag tshor ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag shes pa po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di malha'i bu dag mthong ba po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// 
159b7('bum): lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'dabab bo// ga'i bu dag rdzo ras pa'i phyim chos 'i bo/ 'i bu ga du shes ni gyi chos ni 'o// lha'i bu dag 'du byed zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa ma
159b8('bum): kyirdzo mo la cu dag myig zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rna ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sna zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sreza ba 'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// sA'i bu
160a1('bum): ngag lus zab pa'i phyir chos 'ang rnab bo// lnga'i bu dag yid zab pa'i phyir chos 'ad zab bo// kwa'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di thob bo// lha'i bu dag smra bab pa'i phyir chos 'di bgro
160a2('bum): lha'i bu dag dri zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag ro zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag reg zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag chos zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag myig/ 
160a3('bum): gi rnam par shes pa zab phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lnga'i bu dag sna'i rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// / lha'i bu dag lce'i rnam par the/ 
160a4('bum): pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lus kyi rnam pa dar shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag yid kyi rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag
160a5('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'ibu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lnga'i bu dag sna'i 'dus te reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i
160a6('bum): bu dag lce'i 'dus te reg pa bab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lnga'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lbal bu dag/ lus kyi 'acus kya ga la zab pa'i phyir ches 'di 9/ lha'i bu dag
160a7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'ab pa'i phyir chos 'di khab bo// sra'i bu dag rtsig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// sA'i bu dkan pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba 'a
160a8('bum): pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos/ 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i
160b1('bum): bu dag lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'ang zab bo// lnga'i bu dag yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag sa'i khams bab pa'i phyi/ 
160b2('bum): chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag chu'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mye'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rlung gi khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag nam
160b3('bum): mkha'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa'i khams zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag ma rig pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag 'du byed zab pa'i phyir
160b4('bum): chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mying dang gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag skye mched drug zab pa'i phyir ches 'de lab pa
160b5('bum): khyi ma chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag reg pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag tshor ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zag/ bo// lha'i bu dag sred pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu/ 
160b6('bum): ngag lend pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag srid pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lnga'i bu dag skye ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rga shi zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// 
160b7('bum): lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zab pa'i
160b8('bum): phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag shes rab
161a1('bum): mas kyis 'gyu pa ko/ ba'i budag sa thong pa nyid ba pa'i byang tsha pa 'di ba / pa'i bdan bya skabs nyid bar pa bya rtsa pa 'a ba la bungs kyis thos
161a2('bum): thab pa'i phyir ro pa 'dim ma 'o// 'i bu dag stong pa nyid stong pa nyid thapa pa'i phyi cho sa dbab bo// lha'i bu dag chen ma spongs nyid tha ca phyi tsha ba 'di ma 'o// 'i bu dag dod dam pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyi
161a3('bum): 'di zab bo// lnga'i bu dag 'dus byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lA'i bu dag 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bab pa'i phyir/ 
161a4('bum): chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa/ nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lA'i bu dag dor ba myed/ pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rang
161a5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos thob bo/ lnga'i bu dag myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ 
161a6('bum): lha'i bu dag dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bab pa'i phyir chos 'di bab bo// lnga'i bu dag ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos
161a7('bum): 'di zab bo// lA'i bu dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lnga'i bu dag yang dag par spong ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rdzu 'phrulang ki rkang pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di
161a8('bum): zab bo/ lha'i bu dag dbang po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag stobs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag byang chub kyi yan lag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lnga'i bu dag 'phags
161a9('bum): lha'i du dag rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyi zab bI phyir chos 'di zar bo/ 
161b1('bum): pa'i khamasan lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'ad zab bo// lnga'i bu dag 'phags pa'i bden pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'ang bab bo// lnga'i bu dag bsam gtan zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rang
161b2('bum): myed pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lnga'i bu dag gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lA'i bu dag rnam par tha rad pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lnga'i bu dag mtha/ 
161b3('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag
161b4('bum): mngon par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag ting nge 'dzind zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag gzungs kyi sgo zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo/ lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs/ 
161b5('bum): pa'i stobs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag myi// 'jigs pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag/ so so yang dag par rig pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// 
161b6('bum): lha'i bu dag byams pa chen po zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu snying rje chen po zab pa'i phyir chos 'ad zab bo// lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// 
161b7('bum): lha'i bu dag rgyu nad tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zab pi
161b8('bum): phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag dgra bcom pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rang byang chub zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid zab pa'i phyir/ 
162a1('bum): chos 'di zab bo// lha'i bu dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid zab pa'i phyir zab bo// lha'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad yid ches par dka' ba'i
162a2('bum): chos bstan pa ni ngo mtshar lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gzugs bzung ba'i skad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstand pa ma lags/ tshor ba gzung ba'i slad/ 
162a3('bum): tu ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bstand pa ma lags/ 'du shes gzung ba'i slad tu ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i slad du bahand pa ma lags/ 'du byed gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung

163a1('bum): tsa/ gyi gzung ba'i slad du bsta dad pa ma lags/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/ myi gzung ba'i srad sub hand pa ma lags/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa

166a7('bum): rnam par 'das pa'o// bdag gi rnam par shes pa'i khams so// bdag mi rnam par shes pa'i khams las rnam par 'das pa'o// bdag gi ma rig pa'o// bdag ni ma rig pa can no// bdag gi 'du byed do// 
166a8('bum): bdag ni 'du byed pa'o// bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o// bdag ni rnam par shes pa byed pa'o// bdag gi mying dang gzugs so// bdag ni myer dang gzugs can no// bdag gi skye mched drug go// bdag ni
166b1('bum): skye mched drug can no// bdag gi reg pa mo// bdag ni rig par byed pa'o/ bdag gi tshor ba'o// bdag ni tshor bar byed pa mo/ bdag gi sred pa'o// bdag ni sred par byed pa'o// bdag gi lend bu'o// bdag ni/ 
166b2('bum): mnad par byed pa'o// bdag gi srid pa'o// bdag ni srid pa can no// bdag gi skye ba'o// bdag ni s+ye'i chos can no// bdag gi ga/ zhi'o// bdag min shi'i chos can no// bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
166b3('bum): pa'o// bdag gis spyir ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par
166b4('bum): byang pa'o// bdag gi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// 8 ga gis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya/ 'o/ bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bdag gi/ 
166b5('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya/ 'o// bdag gi bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bdag gis bsam gtan ki pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs
166b6('bum): par byadapa'o// bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed 'o// bdag gi nang stong pa nyid do// bdag gis nang stong pa'i
166b7('bum): ma gyi stong pa nyid do// bdag gis kyi stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi phyinapa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis phyi nang stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi stong pa nyid stong pa'i/ 
166b8('bum): ngorongo// bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi chen pa stong pa nyid da/ bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid do// bdag gis chen po stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi don dam pa
167a1('bum): stong pa nyid do// bdag gis ngos ngam pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// bdag gis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi 'dus ma byas stong / 
167a2('bum): pa nyid do// bdag gi 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid le goms par bya'o// bdag gi thog ma dang
167a3('bum): tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag
167a4('bum): gri rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// bdag gis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bdag gis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la goms par bya/ 
167a5('bum): bdag gi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// bdag gis rang gi/ mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gi mying myigs pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyi
167a6('bum): la goms par bya'o// bdag gi dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid do// bdag gis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o// bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bdag gis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la zhes
167a7('bum): par bya'o// bdag gi dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bdag gis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa la goms par bya'o// bdag gi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// bdag gis dran pa nye
167a8('bum): bar gzhag pa rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi yang dag par spong ba rnams so// bdag gis yang dag par spong ba rnams la pyad par bya'o// bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams so// bdag gis
167b1('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi dbang po rnams so// bdag gis dbang po rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi stobs rnamaso bdag gis stobs rnams la
167b2('bum): spyad par bya'o// bdag gi byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bdag gis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// bdag gis 'phags
167b3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bdag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la khyad par bya'o// bdag gis bsam gtan rnams so// bdag
167b4('bum): gis bsam gtan rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi tshad mye da pa rnams so// bdag gis tshad myed pa rnams la pyad par bya'o// bdag gi gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bdag k+Shi
167b5('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyad pa/ ra bya'o// bdag gi rnam par thard pa rnams so// bdag/ gis rnam par tha rad pa rnams la pyad bar bya'o// bdag gi
167b6('bum): mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bdag gis mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la khyad par bya'o// bdag gi rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
167b7('bum): dang mtshan ma myed pa dang sprond pa byed pa'o// bdag gis rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smonang pa myed pa la myang par bya'o// bdag gi mngon par shes pa rnams so// bdag gis
167b8('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi ting nge 'dzind rnams so// bdag gis ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gis gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bdag gis gzungs kyi
168a1('bum): sgo rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la pyad bar bya'o// bdag gi s+ye 'jigs pa rnam so kyi na #
168a2('bum): par bya'o// bdag gi so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// bdag gis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la khyad par bya'o// bdag gi byams pa chen po'o// bdag gis byams pa chen po la spyad par byan
168a3('bum): bdag gi snying rje chen po'o// bdag gis snying rje chen po la spyad bar bya'o// bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyad par bya'o// bdag gis rgyun
168a4('bum): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// bdag ni rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i wa su 'gyur ro// bdag gi lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bad ga ni lanang cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro// bdag gi phyir myi
168a5('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bdag ni phyir myi 'o ba'in 'gyurabadag gi dgra bcom pa nyid do// bdag ri dgra bcom par 'gyur ro// bdag gi rang byang chub bo// bdag gis rang bya
168a6('bum): chub tu 'gyur ro// bdag gi rang sangs rgyas so// bdag ki rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// bdag gi lam gyi rnam pa shes pa'o// / bdag ni lam gi rnam pa shes par 'gyur ro// bdag gin
168a7('bum): ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid do/ bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar 'dzind pa la spyod do// 
168a8('bum): bam so// sa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ya 'i bu dag do bzhin na/ 
168b1('bum): de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'du shes/ gzung
168b2('bum): ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin// myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ 'du byed gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung
168b3('bum): ba'i phyir ma yin pa/ myig gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rna ba gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sna gzung ba'i phyir bstand pas
168b4('bum): yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin// lce gzung ba'i phyir ba spa nad pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lus ga/ zung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ 
168b5('bum): yid gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'iphyir ma yin// gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sgra gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma
168b6('bum): yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ dri gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ ro gzung ba'i phyir basmra nad pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ reg gzung ba'i phyir
168b7('bum): bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ chos gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ myig gi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyi gas ni/ myi gzung ba'i phyir
168b8('bum): ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung 'i phyi ma yin/ sA'i rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir ra la ni/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes
169a1('bum): gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ gyi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa gtu
169a2('bum): ba'i phyir bstend pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa
169a3('bum): ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lce mas te de pa gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i
169a4('bum): phyir ma yin// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bsdu nad pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yis
169a5('bum): gyis kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyibastan pa la yin/ phyi gzung ba'i khyim ma yin/ na b.li/ 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bas
169a6('bum): pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ mye gzung ba'i phye ma ma yin/ snga'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sde'i 'dus
169a7('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor pa gzung ba'i phyim bstan pa ma yin/ gyi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i khyim bstand pa ma yin/ kyi gzung ba'i
169a8('bum): phyir ma yin/ yid kyi 'acus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ gyi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ sa'i khams gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ gyi gzung ba'i rgyu/ 
169b1('bum): ma yin/ chu'i khams gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin// mya'i khams gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin// rlung gi khams gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ gyi gzung rdzi/ 
169b2('bum): phyir ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/

169b7('bum): skye ba gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ rga shi gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir bas nang pa ma yin// spyir ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa gzupa bani
169b8('bum): bya bstan da pa ma yin/ gyi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/ gyi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ bzod pa'i phyi rol tu phyind pa gzung ba'i/ 
170a1('bum): phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa gzung ba'i bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin/

170a9('bum): 'dus byas song pa ldi bzung gi lci bstan pa ma sI/ rmi khazla 'i pir ma yin// lus ma byas slob pa nyi chu gi phyir bstan pa ma lI/ myi bzung gi phyir ma yin/ 
170b1('bum): bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma yin/ myi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gzung ba'i phyir bstand pa ma/

171a8('bum): gyi gsu'i pa'i phyir ma yin no// lha'i bu dag gang yang gzugs gzung ba'i phyir ram kyi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / tshor ba gzung ba'i phyir ram/ myi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / shes gzung ba

171b5('bum): ba'i phyir ram myi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang // myig gi rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir ram myi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang / sna'in
