200b5('bum): skyesarnam par tha rad pa rnams las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// rnam par thad pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyesarnam par tha rad pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su
200b6('bum): ma skyes so// mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// mthar
200b7('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'dug pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma rjes/ mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// rnam par bar ni
200b8('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// rnam par
201a1('bum): ba rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid las
201a2('bum): gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes// mngon par shes pa rnams las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes
201a3('bum): mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ ting nge 'dzind rnams las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// ting nge 'dzind kyi de bzhin tri/ 
201a4('bum): kyi rjes su ma skyes/ ting nge 'dzind kyi de bzhin nyid las gzha na gi rjes su ma skyes so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes gzungs kyi sgo rnams las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyeso// 
201a5('bum): gzungs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes// de bzhin gshegs
201a6('bum): pa'i stobs rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma
201a7('bum): skyes so// myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ myi 'jigs pa rnams las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// myi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ myi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin
201a8('bum): nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so// so so yang dag par rig
201b1('bum): de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ spos yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid lus gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// byams pa chen po'i rjes su ma skyes/ byams pa chen po las gzhan ki rjes su ma skyes so// 
201b2('bum): byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes// byams pa chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// snying rje chen po'i rjes su ma skyes/ snying rje chen po las gzhan gyi rjes su
201b3('bum): sa skyes so// snying rje chen po 'i di bzhin nyid rjes su ma skyes/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rjes su ma skyes/ sangs rgya
201b4('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyesasangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan
201b5('bum): rjes su ma skyes so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu las gzhan kau rjes su ma skyes so// rgyu nadang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de ban
201b6('bum): nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rgyu rang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de ba zhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes/ la nang cig phyir 'ong ba'i
201b7('bum): bu las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ la nad cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// 
201b8('bum): phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyesaphyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras
202a1('bum): bu'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ dgra bcom pa nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid
202a2('bum): kyi rjes su ma skyes/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// rang byang chub kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rang byang chub las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// rang byang chub kyi de bzhi
202a3('bum): dang dag nyid kyi rjes su skyes/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rje su ma skyes/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes
202a4('bum): so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
202a5('bum): nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen da pa te kyang bzhan nyan las gzhan ga rdzas su ma skyes sa t+ya/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes
202a6('bum): so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rje sa su ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// 'dus byas
202a7('bum): snang pa nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus byas stang 13las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// 'dus byas de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ 'dus byas ltangs nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi
202a8('bum): rjes su ma skyes so// 'dus ma byas ga' pa na kyi rjes su ma skyes su byab gan gi su khyi su shwe de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gi rjes su ma skyes so// 
202b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar kang rjes su skyes pa dang / gang gis rjes su skyes pa dang / gang la rjes su skyes pa dang / gang rjes su skye ba ma 'gyur ba 'am/ gang gis rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba'i chos
202b2('bum): de dag thams cad myed cing myi dmyigs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid dang / ma nord pa de bzhin nyid dang / 
202b3('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni zab pa ste/ de la gzugs myi dmyigs/ gzugs
202b4('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ gzugs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyude la tshor ba kyi dmyigs/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te
202b5('bum): tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ltar myi// gas par ga la 'gyur// de la 'du shes myi dmyigs ka'adu shes kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'du shes nyid kyang myi dgyis
202b6('bum): na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la 'du byed myi dmyigs/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'du byed nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs pa
202b7('bum): ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la
202b8('bum): 'gyur de byig kyi TIg pag phyog ga bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te/ byig nyid kyang gyi dmyigs na/ byig gi 'i bzhin nyid dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ del na'i myi dmyigs na pa'i de bzhin ma
203a1('bum): myi dmyigs te/ rna ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid lta ga la 'gyur/ de la sna myi dmyigs/ sna'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sna nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sna'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs
203a2('bum): par ga la 'gyur/ de la lce myi dmyigs/ lce'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lce nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lce'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lus myi dmyigs// lus kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyig
203a3('bum): te/ lus nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la yid myi dmyigs/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ yid nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyin/ 
203a4('bum): par ga la 'gyur/ de la gzugs myi dmyigs/ gzugs kyi de ba zhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ gzugs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sgra myi dmyigs
203a5('bum): sgra'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sgra nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la dri myi// dmyigs/ dri'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dri nyid kyang myed myin/ 
203a6('bum): na dri'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la ro mya dmyigs/ ro'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ro nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ ro'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la reg myi
203a7('bum): dmyigs// reg gi de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te// reg nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ reg gi dri bzhin nyidi lnga dbyigs par ga la 'gyur// de la chos myi dmyigs/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ chos nyid du
203a8('bum): gyi dmyigs na/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid la dmyigs par ka la 'gyur// de la phyig gnam par shes kyi dmyigs/ byig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dbyigs te/ byig gi rnam par shes pa nyid du
203b1('bum): myi dmyigs na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes/ 
203b2('bum): pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la sna'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te / sna'i
203b3('bum): rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs ma/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la lce'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs
203b4('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lce'i rnam par she/ sa pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la yu/ rnas kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ lus kyi rnam par shes bI
203b5('bum): de bzhin myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ltar myigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi
203b6('bum): dmyigs yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs to// yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lha dbyigs par ka la 'gyur// de la myig
203b7('bum): 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myig gi bdus te reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur
203b8('bum): de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ na ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs lnga
204a1('bum): ka la 'gyur/ de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyig
204a2('bum): bar ga la 'gyur/ de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin gyi dmyigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lnga dmyigs par ka la
204a3('bum): 'gyur/ de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dbyimyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs pa/ 
204a4('bum): ka la 'gyur/ de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i myi dmyigs// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te/ ka pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin
204a5('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur// de la myig gi 'dus te reg/ pa las zung ba'i tshor ba kyi dmyigs/ byig gi 'dus te reg/ ba las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te/ myig gi/ 
204a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na myig ki 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ltar myi gas par ga la 'gyur/ de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung / 
204a7('bum): ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ na ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid myi dmyigs na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor/ 
204a8('bum): ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las/ 
204b1('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i che ge'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus
204b2('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la
204b3('bum): 'gyur/ de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang phyi
204b4('bum): dmyigs na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de ba zhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la yid kyi 'dus te/ reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg
204b5('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi/ 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta
204b6('bum): dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la sa'i khams myi dmyigs/ so'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyu
204b7('bum): de la chu'i 'ams myi dmyigs/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mye'i khams myi dmyigs
204b8('bum): kye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te/ kye'i khams nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lha dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la rlung gi khams myi dmyigs/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin
205a1('bum): nyid myi dmyigs te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la nam mkha'i khams myi dmyigs/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin/ 
205a2('bum): nyid myi dmyigs te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par shes pa'i khams myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
205a3('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur// de la ma rig pa myi dmyigs/ ma rig pa'i tshe
205a4('bum): bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'du byed myi dmyigs/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'du byed ci
205a5('bum): kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ rnam/ par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa
205a6('bum): nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mying dang gzugs myi dmyig/ sa/ mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ mying
205a7('bum): dang gzugs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta myi dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la skye mched drug myi dmyigs/ skye mched drug ka de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ skye
205a8('bum): mched drug nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ skye mched drug de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la reg pa myi dbyigs/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ reg pa nyid kyang myi myi/ 
205b1('bum): na/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chos pa myi dmyigs/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ tshor ba nyid kyi dmyigs na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sred
205b2('bum): pa dmyigs/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sred pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur// de la lend pa'ang bzhin nyid myi dmyigs/ lend pa'i de bzhin nyid
205b3('bum): myi dmyigs te/ lend pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lend pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la srid pa myi dmyigs/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ srid pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na
205b4('bum): srid pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la skye ba dmyi dmyigs/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te/ skye ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid lnga dmyigs par
205b5('bum): la 'gyur/ de la rga shi myi dmyigs/ rga sha'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyi gas te/ rga shi'i nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur// de la sbyin pa'i pha ro/ 
205b6('bum): tu phyind pa myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par/ 
205b7('bum): ka la 'gyur/ de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa' nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 
205b8('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te
206a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa nyid nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs/ 
206a2('bum): dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rolab tu phyinang pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na// brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid lnga dmyigs par ga
206a3('bum): la 'gyur/ de la bsam gtan ka pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 
206a4('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid lha dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te
206a5('bum): ges rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ she/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid lnga dmyigs par// ka la 'gyur/ de la nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa
206a6('bum): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyi kas na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la phyi stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi
206a7('bum): bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la phyi nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyis/ 
206a8('bum): te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs pa ga la 'gyur/ de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs/ 
206b1('bum): te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chen po stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ chen
206b2('bum): po stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la don dam pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ don dam pa
206b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang myi dbyigs na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te/ bskus
206b4('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas sto/ 
206b5('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid/ kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta ga la 'gyur/ de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi
206b6('bum): dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur
206b7('bum): de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa ste/ 
206b8('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dor ba byed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dbyigs na/ 
207a1('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs/ 
207a2('bum): dge/ na rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi dmyigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
207a3('bum): dmyigs na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur// de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi dbyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rang gi mtshan
207a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyi da kyi de bzhin nyid lnga dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la myi dmyig/ sa pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de
207a5('bum): bzhin nyid kyi dbyigs te/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang myi// dmyigs na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta/ dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
207a6('bum): myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi myigs te/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dngos po byed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dbyigs par ga la 'a
207a7('bum): de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dbyigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur
207a8('bum): de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dngos po byed
207b1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi dmyigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid
207b2('bum): kyang myi dmyigs na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la yang dag par spong ba rnams myi dmyigs/ yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ yang
207b3('bum): dag par spong ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dbyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la rdzu 'phrul ki rkang pa rnams myi dmyigs// rdzu 'phrul ki rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
207b4('bum): myi dmyigs te/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la dbang po rnams myi dmyigs/ dbang po 'di bzhin
207b5('bum): nyid myi dmyigs te/ dbang po nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dbang / po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur// de la stobs rnams myi dmyigs/ stobs kyi de bzhin nyid myi
207b6('bum): dmyigs te/ stobs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ stobs rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi de bzhin rje
207b7('bum): myi dmyigs te/ byang chub kyi yan laka nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi dmyigs
207b8('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid la phyi
208a1('bum): par ga la 'gyur// de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi dmyigs// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'a
208a2('bum): dga' pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la bsam gtan rnams myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ bsapa gtan nyid kyang mya rgya kas1/ bsam
208a3('bum): gtan nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ bsam gtan rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la tshad myed pa rnams myi dmyigs/ tshad myed pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ched myed pa nyid kyang
208a4('bum): myi dmyigs na/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam sa myi dmyigs/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i
208a5('bum): de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ gzugs byed pa'i snyoms pa/ ra 'jug pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gzugs myed pa'i sgo/ mas par 'jug pa nas kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga
208a6('bum): 'gyur/ de la rnam par tha rad pa rnams myi dmyigs// rnam pa ratha rad pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam par tha rad pa nyid myi dmyigs na/ rnam par tha rad pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta phyi
208a7('bum): par ga la 'gyur/ de la mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyigs// mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dbyigs te/ mthar da kyis kan
208a8('bum): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang gyi dmyigs na/ mab rad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lha dmyigs pa ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par ba rad pa'i no bang
208b1('bum): dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smo nad pa myed pa myi dmyigs/ rnam par thar da pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
208b2('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mngon par she
208b3('bum): pa rnams myi dmyigs/ mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la
208b4('bum): ting nge 'dzind rnams myi dmyigs/ ting nge 'dzind kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ting nge 'dzind nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lha dmyigs par ga la 'gyu
208b5('bum): de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi dmyigs/ gzungs kyi sgo'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang myi dmyi/ gas na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs
208b6('bum): bar ka la 'gyur// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mya dmyigs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang myi dbyigs na/ 
208b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la myi 'jigs pa rnams myi dmyigs// myi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang myi
208b8('bum): dmyigs na/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi dmyigs// so so yang dag par rig pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te
209a1('bum): so ma yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang myi dmyig sa na/ so ma yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid la dmyigs par kA la 'gyur/ de la byams pa chen po mye dbyig sa// byams pa chen po
209a2('bum): dgo de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te/ byams bca pa kyang byu myigs na/ byams pachen po 'di bzhin nyid dmyigs pa ga 'gyur/ des mi chen pa'i gyi byigs/ ting ci chen tham ro ban tu kyi kyi
209a3('bum): te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang myi dbyigs na/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi dmyigs / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin
209a4('bum): nyid myi dmyigs te// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang kyi dmyigs na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bani dan nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur// de la rgyund tu zhugs pa'i
209a5('bum): 'bras bu myi dmyigs// rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rgyu dang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu kyang myi dmyigs na/ rgyu nang tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu lade ba'i
209a6('bum): nyid lA ka la 'gyur/ de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyi daphyags// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 
209a7('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ phyir myi 'ong
209a8('bum): ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la dgra bcom pa nyid dmyigs/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 
209b1('bum): dgra bcom pa nyin myi dmyigs na/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid la dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rang byang chub kyi dmyigs// rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te// rang byang chub nyid kyang gyi
209b2('bum): dmyigs na/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myi dmyigs/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lam gyi rnam pa zhes
209b3('bum): pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid myi dmyigs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi
209b4('bum): myi dmyigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang myi dmyi dgas na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dalta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis
209b5('bum): bkal yal ba/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de ban na te/ de bzhin nyid de ni zab pa ste/ de la gzugs myi myi/ kas/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid myi dbyigs te/ gzugs
209b6('bum): nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la tshor ba myi dmyigs/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ tshor ba'i
209b7('bum): bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'du shes myi dmyigs/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'du shes nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga
209b8('bum): la 'gyur/ de la 'du byed myi dmyigs// 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'du byed nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par zhes
210a1('bum): pa myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la myig kyi// 
210a2('bum): dges dmyigs myig gi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myig nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ myig gi de bzhin nyid lha dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la na pa myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i de bal de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs
210a3('bum): rna ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la snga myi dmyigs/ sna'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyig te/ sna nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sna'i de bzhin nyid lnga dbyigs par ka
210a4('bum): la 'gyur/ de la lce myi dmyigs/ lce'i de bzhin nyid myi myi gas te/ lce nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lce'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur// de la lus myi dmyigs/ lus kyi
210a5('bum): de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lus nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la yid kyi dmyigs/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dbyigs te/ 
210a6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid kyang myi dbyigs na/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la gzugs myi dmyigs/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ gzugs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 
210a7('bum): gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la smra dmyigs// sgra'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sgra nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de
210a8('bum): la dri myi dmyigs/ dri'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dri nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dri'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la ro myamyi dmyigs/ ro'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ro nyad
210b1('bum): kyang myi dmyigs na/ ro'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la reg myi dmyigs/ reg gi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ reg nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ reka ki de bzhin nyid lha dmyigs pa
210b2('bum): ka la 'gyur/ de la chos kyi dmyigs/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ chos nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyig sa par ka la 'gyur// de la myig gi rnam par shes
210b3('bum): pa myi dmyigs/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyu
210b4('bum): de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i rnam par shesapa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
210b5('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sna'i rnam parashes pa myi dmyigs/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyo dmyigs te/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs
210b6('bum): sna'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lce'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid
210b7('bum): kyang myi dmyigs na/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lha dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 
210b8('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i// 
211a1('bum): de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur// de la myig gi 'dus te reg pa/ 
211a2('bum): myi dmyigs/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ 
211a3('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyis/ 
211a4('bum): par ka la 'gyur/ de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigadas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sna'i 'dus te
211a5('bum): reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid
211a6('bum): kyang myi dmyigs na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te
211a7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs/ yid kyi ludus te reka ni/ 
211a8('bum): de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang gyi dbyigs na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lha dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la gyig gi 'dus te reg pa las rgya
211b1('bum): pa'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba lci de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ myig gi 'dus te reg/ 
211b2('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga lo 'gyur// de la sa 'a khams mya myags/ sa lakhams bya da bzhin nyid mya dmyags te/ sa' khams nyid kyang mya dmyigs na
211b3('bum): de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs
211b4('bum): na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhi dan nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sna'i 'dus te/ reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ sna'i 'dus te reg
211b5('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin
211b6('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i myi dmyigs/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lce'i 'dus te reg
211b7('bum): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ide bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung
211b8('bum): pa'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lus kyi lu
212a1('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myi dmyigs/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de
212a2('bum): dag bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la sa'i las
212a3('bum): myi dmyigs/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chu'i khams myi dmyigs/ chu'i las/ 
212a4('bum): nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ltar myigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la mye'i khams myi dmyigs/ dmye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ mye'i khams
212a5('bum): nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ mye'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ltar/ dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rlung gi khams myi dmyigs rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rlung gi khams
212a6('bum): nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid lha dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la nam mkha'i khams myi dmyinas/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ nam pa 'a'i
212a7('bum): nyid kyang gyi dmyigs na/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la rnam par shes pa gyi dmyigs// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyi dbyigs te/ rnam
212a8('bum): par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la ma rig pa myi dmyigs/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ma rig pa nyid
212b1('bum): kyang myi dmyigs na/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'du byed myi dmyigs/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'atu byed kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin
212b2('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
212b3('bum): lha dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la mying dang gzugs myi dmyigs/ mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ mying dang gzugs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ mying dang gzugs kyi de bzhin te/ 
212b4('bum): lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la skye mched drug myi dmyig sa/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ skye mched drug nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin
212b5('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la reg pa myi dmyig/ sa/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ reg pa'i nyid// kyang myi dmyigs na/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyig par
212b6('bum): ga la 'gyur/ de la tshor ba myi dmyigs/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ tshor ba nyid kyang myi dbyigs na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la sred pa myi dmyigs/ 
212b7('bum): sbeng ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ med pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ med pa'i de bzhin nyid lha dmyigs par ka la 'gyur// de la yi nad pa myi dmyigs/ lend pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te/ 
212b8('bum): le nad pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lend pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la srid pa myi dmyigs/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang myi dmyig
213a1('bum): na/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la skye ba myi dmyigs/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ skye ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ltar dmyig
213a2('bum): du dngabar ka la 'gyur/ de la rga shi phyi dmyigs/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rga shi nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur// de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin/ 
213a3('bum): ba myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka
213a4('bum): la 'gyur/ de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyi kas// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang
213a5('bum): myi dmyigs na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa myi dmyigs/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu
213a6('bum): phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa' nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur// de la brtson
213a7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyirang pa kyi dmyigs/ bzor 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ brtson
213a8('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur// de la bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan ka pha rol tu phyind pa yi de bzhin nyid myi
213b1('bum): dmyigs te/ bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind
213b2('bum): ba myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi dmyigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i de bzhin nyid lnga/ 
213b3('bum): dmyigs par ka la 'gyur// de la nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs
213b4('bum): par ga la 'gyur// de la phyi stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ phyi ste pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par
213b5('bum): ka la 'gyur/ de la phyi rang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ phyi// nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ phyi nang stong // pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
213b6('bum): lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ stong pa nyid sto
213b7('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la chen po stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ chen po
213b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la don dam pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang myi
214a1('bum): dmyigs ma/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 
214a2('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de
214a3('bum): bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi
214a4('bum): dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyi/ da myi dmyigs te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang / myi dmyigs na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin
214a5('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ thog ma dang
214a6('bum): ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang phyi dmyigs na/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lha dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ dor ba byed pa stong
214a7('bum): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi
214a8('bum): dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la chos
214b1('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid myi dmyigs nya chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs
214b2('bum): par ka la 'gyur/ de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rang gi mtshan nyid
214b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myi dmyig pa/ stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyig
214b4('bum): na myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dngon/ 
214b5('bum): po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
214b6('bum): kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lha dmyigs par ge/ la 'gyur/ de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyig/ 
214b7('bum): dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dbyig/ 
214b8('bum): par ga la 'gyur// des dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi dmyigs/ dran pa rtse bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te// dran brtse bar gzhag pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dran pa nye bar ga / 
215a1('bum): pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur// de la yang dag par spong ba rnams myi dmyigs/ yam dag par khrom pa rnams phyinamyi gas// yang dag par spong ba'i de bzhin nyid
215a2('bum): myi dmyigs te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la rdzu 'phrul ki rkang pa rnams myi dmyigs// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang sde
215a3('bum): de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur// de la dbang po rnams myi dmyigs/ dbang po'i de bzhin
215a4('bum): nyid myi dmyigs te/ dbang po nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dbang po 'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la stobs rnams myi dmyigs/ stobs kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te
215a5('bum): stobs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ stobs rnams kyi de bzhi na nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la byang chub kyi ya/ na lag rnams myi dmyigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnaMs
215a6('bum): de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang myi dmyigs na// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta myigs param 'gyur/ de la 'phags pa'i lam yan
215a7('bum): lag brgyad pa myi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
215a8('bum): lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid lha dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi dmyigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi dbyigs te/ 'phakas pa'i 'den
215b1('bum): sa gtan gyi de bzhi nyid myi dmyig+sa te/ sa gtan na kyang myi dmyigs na/ 
215b2('bum): pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnaMs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la bsam gtan rnams myi dmyigs// bsam gtan nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ 
215b3('bum): de la tshad myed pa rnaMs myi dmyigs/ tshad myed pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ tshad myed pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ tshad myed pa rnaMs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la gzugs myed
215b4('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyigs/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ gzugs mye
215b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par dag la 'gyur/ de la rna bar tha rad pa nas myi dmyigs// rna par/ tha rad pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam par tha rad pa nyid
215b6('bum): kyang myi dmyigs na// rdo bar thard pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la mthard kyis gnas/ pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs myi dmyigs/ mthar kyis
215b7('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi de bzhi
215b8('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshar ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa myi dmyigs// rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon
215b9('bum): pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed
216a1('bum): dang smond pa myed pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur// de la mngon par shes pa rnaMs myi dmyigs/ mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang // 
216a2('bum): gamyi dmyigs na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la ting nge 'dzind rnams myi dmyigs// ting nge 'dzind kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang
216a3('bum): myi dmyigs na/ ting nge 'dzind rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi dmyigs/ gzungs kyi sgo 'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang
216a4('bum): myi dmyigs na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta myi gas par ga la 'gyur/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sto/ sa rnams myi dmyigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi
216a5('bum): bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobasarnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de
216a6('bum): la myi 'jigs pa rnams myi dmyigs/ myi 'jigs pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ myi 'jigs pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur
216a7('bum): de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myi dmyigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnam kyi sprin kyi dmyigs te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnaMs kyi de
216a8('bum): bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la snying rje chen po myi dmyigs/ snying rje chen po'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ snying rje chen po de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs
216b1('bum): par ka la 'gyur/ de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnaMs myi dmyigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin
216b2('bum): nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ 
216b3('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ lan cig phyir/ 
216b4('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ lan cig phyir 'ong pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la ka la 'gyur de la phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras
216b5('bum): bu'i de bzhin nyid mya dmyigs te/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin// nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la dgra bcom pa nyid myi
216b6('bum): dmyigs/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ga la 'gyur/ de la rang byang chub myi dmyigs/ rang
216b7('bum): byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur/ de la gi rna ba zhes pa nyid myi dmyigs/ la gi rna pa shes kya du ma myi dmyigs te/ la gi
216b8('bum): na pa shes pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na/ la ki rno ba shes pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs parA ka la 'gyur/ de la R+sha pa dza sa nA mkhyen pa nyid myi dmyigs/ rna ba thas cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid myi dmyigs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
216b9('bum): pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmyigs par ka la 'gyur// 
217a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyirang pa stong phrag spyang / kA yadwa ti'i bu de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor pa de bzhin nyid dang / nam ma yin pa re ba'i mnyid/ 
217a2('bum): kyi le'u bshad pa'i tshe/ dge slong nyis brgya nye ba ma le na kyis zag pa mam yo na par grol lo// dge slong ma sa brgya ni chos rnams sa chos kyi myig rdum myed ci rngam dang bral ba skyes so// 
217a3('bum): byang chub sems dpal lnga stong dang / lba dang kyi rnams kyis kyi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su nyam pa'i chos cis drug su ni nye ba ma yi dad pa byed pa mthan
217a4('bum): ba las sems rnam par grol mo// shar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gis ni/ sa sa rgyas lnga brgya bstend bkur te/ thams ca'ang sbyin
217a5('bum): byin / tshul khrims bsrungs// bzod pa bsgoms brtson 'grus batshams/ bsam gtan bsgrubs shes rab bsgoms kyang / de dag zhes rab kyi pha rol
217a6('bum): tu phyind pas yongs su ma bzung/ thabs mkhas pas yod sa su ma bzung bas sbyin pa byin te/ 'di sbyin pa'o// 'di la bdag gis sbyin par bya'o/ 'di la sbyin par bya
217a7('bum): bya'o// 'di ni tshul khrims so// bdag gis ni bsrung bar bya'o// 'di ni bzod pa'o// bdag gis bzod pa bsgom par bya'o// 'di ni brtson 'grus so// bdag gis ni brtson par bya
217a8('bum): 'di ni zhesam ga rtan no/ bdag gis ni bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag par bya'o// 'di ni shes rab bo// bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o zhes tha dad par spyod pas/ de dag shes rab kyi
217b1('bum): pha rol da tu phyind pa dang bral zhing / thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bar sbyin pa gtong ngo // tshul khrims srungs/ bzod pa sgom/ btson 'grus com/ bsam gtan la mnyam par ga'ago
217b2('bum): shes rab goms par byed cing / de dag 'du shes sna tshogs kyi gyod pas tha myi dad pa ma dmyigs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon byed par ma zhugs so// de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod byed
217b3('bum): bar ma zhugs pas/ rgyund tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob/ rang byang chub thob ste/ shar
217b4('bum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lam stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod mod kyi/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
217b5('bum): dang bral zhing / thabs mkhas pa dang bral zhing yongs su ma/ bzung na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon tu byas nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// gso yang
217b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma mchis pa dang / spond pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la sgom du yang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa dang bral zhing / thabs
217b7('bum): mkhas pa dang bral ba rnams ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon tu bgyis shing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas yongs su
217b8('bum): bzung ba dag ni/ stong pa nyid dam rdzam mchis pa dang smond pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la sgom tu bas kyang / thabs mkhas pa la rte nad cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
218a1('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' aHlad pa/ sha ra dA ti'i bu 'di la kha cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i sems dang bral ba/ stong pa nyid
218a2('bum): dgadang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i chos 'ga' shig bsgom pa ni thabs ma khra ba lokho nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag tu 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
218a3('bum): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen dpa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba rnams ni/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i chos rnams la sgom zhing thabs mkhas pa thob las byang chub seMs
218a4('bum): dpa'i skyon myed pa thob pa cing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na bya zhig la lus dpag tshad
218a5('bum): brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad nyis brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad su ma brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad bzhi b+hA 'am/ dpag tshad snga brgya bzhig yod la/ de sum cu rtsa gsum gi lha'i ris
218a6('bum): nas 'dir 'ong bar 'dod pa/ byadel 'dab sa byed bzhin ste/ 'dam bu'i gling tu gnas so snyam nas/ sum cu ma gsum gyi rlo marim nas bdag nyid 'tshongs sa man ci'i bu de'i mas
218a7('bum): sems gal te bya de lam nas/ ma la bdag gis sum cu ma gsum gi lha'i ris su gnas par bya'o snyam sems sam/ sha ra dra ti'i bu de la ji snyam du sems/ bya des phyir sum \u0f7fgsum
218a8('bum): gi lha'i ris su gnas par nus sas/ gsol ra pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkams med pa/ gas te lam nas 'di snyam du ma la bdag gis
218b1('bum): ci nas kyang ma smas ma snad par 'dre 'u'i kring du 'dug par bya'o snyam na sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la ji snyam du sems bya de 'dzam bu'i kring du ma sbas pa sdang bar 'dug par 'gyur ram// gsol dpa
218b2('bum): zarnam ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dzam bu'i gling du spung nas sbas pa 'am sdud par yang 'gyur/ 'gum pa 'am/ 'gum pa la thug par sdug bsngal khams pa 'gyur

218b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsasad pa gang la 'i klung gi bye ma snyed tu sbyis pa ba gtong zhing / tshul khrims srung/ bzod pa sgos/ brtson 'grus ma/ ma
218b5('bum): gtan la mnyam par gzhog cing / bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir/ de'i smon pa yang che/ de'i sems
218b6('bum): bskyed za yang chayongs su 'dzind pa yang tshad myed du zi nad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang bral zhing / thabs mkhas bas yongs su ma bzung na/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ 
218b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sor ltung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' des rnam pa thams cad mkhyedad pa nyid kyi sems dang myi ldan par sbyin pa byin// tshul khrims
218b8('bum): bru ma / bzod pa bsgoms brtson 'grus bcamams/ bsam gtan bsgrubs pas byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyind pa dang bral zhi pathazas mkhas pas yongs su ma
219a1('bum): bzung ba'i phyir/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpal 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin
219a2('bum): gshegs pa rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa sems shing 'dzind pa la mtshan mar byed kyang de bzhin
219a3('bum): gshegs pa rnams tshul khrims myi shes ting nge 'dzin du myi shes/ shes rab myi shes/ rnam par grol ba myi shes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa myi shes na/ de myi shes khong tu ma chud
219a4('bum): pas/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i sgra thos nas de ni de dag zhi bar mtshan mar 'dzind te/ des de dag la mtshan mar bzung zhing / bla na myed pa yang
219a5('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sde'o// de ltar bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ro// 
219a6('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu de ci 'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang bral bas dgel ba'i rtsa ba de dag tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su 'gro
219a7('bum): ba ni de ltar 'gyur du gdon gyi za'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po thog ma sems bskyed pas nas nye bar bzung ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa'i sem
219a8('bum): dang ma bral bar sbyin pa gtong zhing / tshul khrims srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / bcon 'grus chom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyi nad pa dang / 
219b1('bum): zaza ma la zhes pa dang ma bral ba de 'das pa dang / ma byond pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzind dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba da
219b2('bum): rnam par rnam sa'i sogs gzigs 'dul sa can par gyi byed / rnangs nyid kyi ting nge 'dzinan pa mtshan par kyi 'dzis/ mtshan ma kyang pa matal pa 'dzidzin pa mtshan par gyu 'dzid/ na pa
219b3('bum): bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa la mtshan par gyi 'dzin na/ sha ya dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ nyan thos dang / rab sangs rgyas kyi sal gnas par gyi 'gyur bar rig par bya/ 
219b4('bum): de cim phyir zhes nga'i 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des logs sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzu sbyin pa khyim yang mtshan mams bzung / tshul khrims 'ardzun
219b5('bum): kyang mtshan mar ma bkru pa/ 'bod pa bsgrubs kyang mtshan ma mam bzung / bcom 'grus brtsams kyang mtshan mar ma bzung / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag kyang mtsham man
219b6('bum): ma bzung / zhes rab ba skams kyang mtshan sems bzung 'das pa dang ma byon pa da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzind dang
219b7('bum): ma lam dang / rnam par mos pa dang / rnam par grol thams shes ga'igs kyisatshan sems bzung / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / gnad pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin sa bsgoms kya
219b8('bum): mcharnga ma ma bdu tha/ sha man ti'i bu de ltar mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis tshul khrims srung ba dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i
220a1('bum): sems kyis bzod pa sgrub pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis brtson 'grus chom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag
220a2('bum): dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis shes rab sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis nang stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis phyi stong pa nyid sgom pa
220a3('bum): dpa mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis chen po
220a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / 
220a5('bum): mtshan pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid// skom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mtha' lasu 'das pa stong pa nyid la sgom pa dang // mtshan
220a6('bum): ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis thog ma dpa ba ma myed pa stong pa nyid skom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dor ba mye ra pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang/ mtshan ma dang bral
220a7('bum): ba'i sems kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid skom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong
220a8('bum): pa nyid skol ba dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sgom pa dang / mtshad ma da
220b1('bum): dang zam pa'i sems kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid slob pa dang / mtshan ma' dang grol ba'i sems kyis dngos po byed pa'i ngo bo nyid sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dran pa nye bar
220b2('bum): gzhag pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams sgom pa rang
220b3('bum): mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis dbang po rnams skos pa dang // mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems stobs rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis byang chub kyi yan laka rnams sgom
220b4('bum): bdamam can sa dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'phags pa'i lam ngan lag brkyang ba sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang thal ba'i sems dkyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams skom pa dang /

220b7('bum): sems kyis rnam par thard pa'i sgra stong pa nyid dang mtshams myed pa dang smon pa myed pa sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis mngon par shes pa rnams skom pa dang / 
220b8('bum): mtshan pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis ting nge 'dzind rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems
221a1('bum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dang bral ba'i sems kyis kyi 'jigs pa rnams sgom pa dang / mtshan ma dpabs pa'i sems kyis so so /

221a6('bum): la 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa'o// gsol dpa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag kyis 'tshal pa ltar na/ byang chub sems dang /

221b1('bum): gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba la dang / gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i gzugs sam tshor ba 'am// 'du shes
221b2('bum): 'du byed dam/ rnam par shes pa'am// myig kas/ rna pa 'am/ sA 'am/ lce 'am/ lus sam/ yid dam/ gzugs sam/ sgra 'am/ tri 'am/ ro 'am/ reg gam/ chos sam

221b4('bum): myig gi 'dus te reg pa'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'am/ yid kyi 'dus

222a1('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dang / bsam ga/

222a3('bum): gnyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid dam/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dam/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dam/ phog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dam/
